desc: This is really a excellent hotel.I visited after many years still I fell so good and my memories get refreshed. The room are very spacious,the staff is very polite & helpful. The lobby is still same and well maintained.Best thing is you fell at home inspite of such a huge hotel because of cautious staff. The food is very good and room service is excellent. It is at good location.The Botanical garden which is UNESCO Heritage site is very close which has beautiful Orchids garden in it Really a memorable experience .

title: Quick stop
desc: I love this hotel, went for the High Tea and loved everything about this place, the staff are very nice, the food was exquisite. Manhattan Bar was fun, the food was very good too. Bed was very comfortable

title: Manhattan bar
desc: Fabulous start to an evening great drinks menu tasty snacks and fabulous atmosphere. One to visit if in Singapore. Understandable why it's the top bar in Asia. Entertaining to watch mixoligists and to have the guided tour of aging barrels.

title: Outstanding service
desc: From the second i arrived until i left service was exceptional. The lady at check in was super nice showing me to the waiting reception until my room was ready. The concierge was very informative as well. Finally, i enjoyed breakfast: omelette station, asian station, indian food, western food, salmon, fruit and most of the items i could ask for. I enjoyed my stay and would definitely book again. Thanks to all the tean speacilly to the nice lady who assisted me during check in.

title: Singapore delight
desc: What can I say that would fully describe this hotel .... I think amazing might do ? Or fantastic? Or incredible ... yes that should be the word. A large hotel but very personal service with care and attention. The food in the hotel was just fantastic and the wee bar on the first floor was an experience that can’t be missed. Highly recommend

title: Top notch: Service, details and hospitality
desc: Booked Regent on behalf of my parents whom stayed here every time they visit Singapore for good reason. They praise the food, service and the hospitality. As this was a pre-celebration of my fathers birthday it has to be special. Was looking at Four Season, Mandarin Oriental as alternatives but went for Regent and opted for Club Room. Very well done Regent cause I don’t regret it at all. Here’s just a selection of why it was so Amazing: + Upgrade to Suite as a present to my father’s Bday + Bday cake waiting as a welcome present + One of the best Club Lounge food in Singapore + It’s all in the details which you all got covered. For example: Electrical sockets built in the furniture fits different types of international. Cleaning less is spotless + Your amenities in your

title: Great Value for Money, Excellent Staff
desc: We had our stay-cation here, booked the Regent Club Premier Room, Business Lounge Access, City View. For what u get from the Club, yummy food, excellent staff service, it was all worth it. Gangai, the lady who was serving us from the Club was so nice to us. She made us fell comfortable, it felt like we have known her forever! She has a great smile that makes guests feel welcomed all the time. The Front desk staff were awesome too, they managed to give us our room key at 10:30 in the morning! It was a lovely stay and we'll definitely be back! keep it up guys!

title: Good hotel but not Four Seasons
desc: older property, but well maintained. Rooms are spacious and clean. Staff was friendly and helpful. Breakfast was ok, but need to get there early to avoid daily queuing. Good location, very near to main arteries and CBD. This hotel seems to have the same challenge as most properties in Singapore nowadays, lack of staff and declining levels of service.

title: Regent Singapore, a special experience
desc: My husband and I booked three nights at the Regent Singapore as the starting point of a special retirement holiday, so we wanted a hotel out of the ordinary. We were not disappointed. The hotel is grand - we stayed in the Ministers Suite, a collection of rooms filled with fresh orchids, comfortable furnishings and a large bedroom. The wifi was fast, the food was delicious and the service was exemplary. The afternoon tea and bar facilities were excellent and the cost was reasonable. We chose a room that gave us access to the Executive Lounge so we had a quiet place to relax at the end of the day, and the deal included breakfast. The queue to get into breakfast was quite lengthy on each of the three mornings, but the wait was worth it as the breakfast selection and quality was

title: Easter week end in Singapore
desc: This is a beautiful hotel for people who like an older grand hotel style, beautiful comfortable rooms, lovely staff, good service. It is set just off Orchard Rd so it was really quiet at night but close to MRT ( 10 min walk) cafes & shopping. We stayed 4 nights after our cruise, it was our first trip to Singapore. This hotel has a beautiful pool & gr8 air con as it was really hot & muggy. We didn't eat at their restaurants but did enjoy coffee & a muffin each am in their bakery/deli b4 our sightseeing trip out for the day. Yes, I would choose to stay there again.

title: 5" stars not enough (Who knows a word which goes beyond "Excellent") I do: "REGENT
desc: I have stayed in the Regent hotel several times . Always very good. However my last stay was beyond excellent. I like the looks of the hotel and its rooms which answers to what you might expect of a modern hotel. But the human factor makes this all so different special and thus so special. From room maid to the great doorman and from the wonderful ladies (and gentleman) at the reception and concierge -office to the fantastic restaurant manager of the Summer Palace Chinese Restaurant, they all make you feel so very welcome and feel at home. Their service felt so natural and honest; always with a smile. You all are great! Thanks to you all. Hope to return asap. ps to: Lady from Concierge office who helped me with getting a better at airplane to Europe it worked out fine!

title: Great hotel. Excellent staff.
desc: I am very grateful that the hotel noticed that it was my wife's birthday and upgraded our room. Also the hotel and the in-house restaurant (Basilico) was it a point to make her feel very special. Such as complimentary birthday cake in the room and at the restaurant. She was very happy. This is a very nice hotel and the service was excellent.

title: Good location and great staff
desc: This hotel is well located about 5 minutes' walkind distance to Orchard Road. Our suite was clean, and well furnished with a king-size bed. The room was quite spacious with a separate lounge area. Some elements of the room, particularly in the bathroom, looked a bit and ready for a refurbishment. Excellent bathroom toiletries. Good wifi connection in the room and throughout the hotel. Breakfast is a self service buffet and has a good variety of choices including both Oriental and Western food options. Omelettes are made fresh at the request of guests. Sleep quality is excellent. The bed was comfortable and the room was very quiet . The hotel has a pool, a well-equipped gym and a number of restaurant options. Staff were excellent and very keen to ensure that guests have

title: Pleasure
desc: Spacious room, spotless, friendly & helpful staff, dining and a bar/lounge is available, huge beds and the most important the hotel is located in the heart of Orchard street (shopping) and close to the subway station. This is a great choice for visitors in Singapore.

title: Friendly staff, great service; Nice
desc: I’ve booked The Regent Hotel again, after my family and I stayed there last August. Same as last time, my stay was great. Great service, friendly staff and comfortable rooms. However there were some issues, but were immediately solved in best ways by the hotel management. Although I’ve to say, the hotel isn’t the newest anymore, so it is obviously visible to you at the little details. I’m certainly the maintenance staff is doing the best, to keep up with everything. Enjoy your stay and service at the regent.

title: Acceptable stay at a good location
desc: If you like to be in city centre, at where Singapore shopping belt is, but not smacked right in the middle of all that noise and buzz, then Regent Singapore is a good choice. Room was clean and big, but had some musky smell. Food at summer palace was great, love the pastries from the bakery (sales take place after 8pm everyday) and cheese at Brasilico was awesome. The only few less satisfying experiences were: - gym can be further improved. It had some smell and half of the equipment are very old - inconsistent service rendered (my cousin staying across the floor was told that toothbrush was out of stock while I could get one) - service mistakes (I brought an additional person for the buffet breakfast. Knowing that the hotel will usually charge it to the room, I requested for

title: Scam
desc: Was here tonight in a private function room for my sons football academy. Around 10pm I asked for another glass of red wine, which have to be paid for by glass for an extortionate price considering the quality of the wine, and was told cash only and upfront.... This set my alarm bells off of course. I told the girl that this is a 5 star hotel? She would check she said.... after seeing her lingering outside for 5 minutes I asked her if the problem is solved and she did not now what to say and looked for an answer at her colleagues..... Told them to forget about it but will take this up at the desk down stairs later.... within 2 seconds a guy showed up... smelling like an ashtray btw.... offering me a free glass of wine which I declined.... You seriously need to check and train

title: Excellent Room, Staff, Restaurants
desc: Have stayed twice on business. Comfortable, clean, and excellent staff. The breakfast is extensive. Bascilico Italian restaurant has an amazing buffet with over 30 varieties of cheese. Tenchin has excellent tempura. Great for solo travelers.

title: Wow REGENT
desc: Absolutely amazing hotel. Staff so kind and efficient. Food service amazing. Pay extra and get on REGENT CLUB level worth every cent all things delivered at high standard. Close to botanical garden and major shops.

title: Nice hotel
desc: We came for second time here and the front officer knows us, they up grade our room to suite room with living room, large rooms, very comfortable, clean rooms. Amazing. Thanks for all your kindness Regent🙏🙏

title: Great hotel and amazing breakfast!
desc: Stayed here for work, very nice hotel, located a few minutes walk from the Ion Orchard metro stop. Staff was very friendly and helpful, I arrived from the US and needed a shower after my 17 hour flight. Although my room wasnt ready they let me use the locker room in the gym to shower and change and then store my bags with them while I went to explore. Rooms are very nice and the breakfast buffet is fantastic, food from all over the world, and plenty of vegetarian options!

title: Very nice Hotel
desc: Very nice Hotel , not quite 5 star but clean, comfortable spacious and with excellent staff. Concierge was extremely informative and helpful and every staff member went out of their way to greet and help as necessary. There’s a decent gym and outside pool and free wifi throughout the property. Breakfast was a very good and extensive buffet. Its around 30 minutes taxi ride from the airport, next to a small Mall, close to Orchard Road shopping and 20 minutes walk from the MRT network.

title: As good as i remember
desc: I've not stayed at the Regent for a few years so was interested to see how it had travelled since my last visit. I'm delighted to say it's much as I remembered. You won't find a friendlier hotel anywhere. Right from check in to departure nothing but smiles & an enquiry as to how they might help you. I defy anyone to improve on the breakfast. An amazing array of dishes perfectly presented. Something for everyone. The rooms are large & have high ceilings. The air conditioning is quiet & efficient. There are robes & slippers, an ironing board, in room safe & plenty of power outlets. The furniture in my room was looking a little dated & could have done with a refresh. The bathroom was full marble with an over bath shower. Once again the plumbing could have done with a bit of

title: Best in Class customer oriented Staff & Service!
desc: My family and I have been in 5 hotels in Singapore for the past 3 years (Swishotel Merchant, Shangri-La Sentosa, Hard Rock Hotel Sentosa , Mandarin Orchard and Regent Hotel) — Regent Hotel is best in class when it comes to customer oriented staff and service... the staff are very warmth, friendly , helpful and all smiling every time. We stayed for 5 nights in Regent and it was all pleasant stay from front desk to room to gym to buffet restaurant (Basilico) and up to printing documents that I need during my stay there... because of his reason, I would definitely have Regent as my 1st choice hotel when I come back to Singapore. The location is near Orchard road , about 5 minutes walk but could be not that easy breezy if you have kids tag along with you but taking taxi is also a

title: Double standards
desc: Stayed at Regent for a couple of days in July with club access and it was a pleasant stay --- unfortunately, only on a superficial level. Saw the ugly side of the hospitality industry. Was at club for breakfast one morning, having my coffee and taking a moment to relax and saw that the regular staff were scurrying around, offering personalised service with a genuine smile but the female manager was just idle, in a rather bossy manner, not helping out at all. Not entirely sure of her name but something along the lines of Christy or Christine? Bossy, fake smile...kinda spoiled my morning when I was there to really start my holiday right with a pilates class scheduled for my morning. Strongly suggest avoiding her. The rest were absolutely a delight to speak to and interact with.

title: Great for business trip but just okay for holiday
desc: I visited this hotel in July 2018 on a business trip. My feedback: Room was small and hotel a little dated. View was not very appealing as my room faced an opposite apartment/condo complex Plugs/outlets were sufficient Internet was fast, plus they provide a mobile 3g/4g device which you can bring around Singapore - however many malls/outlets in the city already provide free WiFi Room service was twice a day, room was very clean. However when I called for housekeeping help service was a little slow, this was probably due to hotel being a little full around my time of visit Toiletries were great- hotel provides loccitane products Water was insufficient. The room only comes with two tiny water bottles unlike my earlier stay in 2016. Breakfast spread was delicious and hotel staff

title: staycation
desc: best pet staycation in singapore. my bichon was so welcomed and the breakfast served in the room was so sumptuous. they even have a pet bowl for my pet plus a little bed and a toy. we were not even charged extra for pet cleaning.

title: Best hotel I have stayed at in Singapore
desc: Not only does this hotel have the best decor, the staff are so professional and efficient, they seem to know what you want almost before you ask for it. We had a club room with an extra bed and the breakfast variety and quality on the 2nd floor as well as the snacks in the afternoon in the club lounge were absolutely superb. Luggage, we had a lot of it, was handled with care and the concierge organised transport for us on a number of occasions. To welcome us on our tenth wedding anniversary, they had a superb chocolate cake with raspberry topping and a tray with lollies and sweet treats waiting in our room!!! OMG. Next time you’re in Singapore, do yourself a favour and book this one. You will be impressed. The only regrettable thing was we only stayed 1 night on our way back to

title: Perfect for both business and pleasure
desc: We’ve been coming to this hotel for years, and will continue to do so. Excellent service, great rooms and wonderful food. A stay in the club rooms is well worth the extra cost as the choice of food and beverages is excellent, the facilities are nice and the staff at the club lounge are very attentive.

title: Great service recovery
desc: Rooms are a little old but for the price we paid- nothing to complain. Great service everywhere except when checking in. The front desk staff, Stan, wasn’t helpful and gave us a twin bed despite our specific requests. A director level guy called us and fixed it immediately. Very fast and good response from top management. Excellent and highly recommended.

title: 5 star hotel? Maybe 30 years ago.
desc: First time I've been let down by TA. The regent comes up in a 5 star search of hotels in Singapore. While the restaurants and bars would easily meet that criteria, (having said that, the whole hotel looks mostly original from maybe 20 - 30 years ago) the rooms definitely wouldn't. Old and slightly musty and in desperate need of renovation. When was the last time you stayed at a 5 star hotel that had a step in bath with a plastic shower curtain? Move on.

title: Superb!
desc: Wonderful experience - 5-star service throughout and good buffet breakfast spread at Basilico. Were given connecting rooms at level 9 . A short walk to Tanglin Mall offers snacks , sushi and even durians. Gym and spa were well-maintained. it's about 7 mins walk to Orchard. Would definitely go back again

title: My go to hotel in Singapore
desc: By my second visit to this hotel most of the staff knew my name. It is less like a hotel and more like staying with family. The breakfast buffet is spectacular. Full facilities, pool, fitness, etc... available at the property. The american whiskey bar, Manhattan, is very nice. Upscale with an excellent selection of whiskies. Just a short walk to Orchard Road.

title: Feels Welcomed
desc: Has been a while I last had a stay with Regent for unwinding purposes. Never did I expect Regent, specifically to Miss Ang Qing Hui, had specially left a card behind and awaiting for my arrival. It definitely made me feel more welcomed and I'm being remembered by Regent. Despite it was a small gesture, it tells a thousand words about their hospitality. I wasn't any VIP who had booked a suite but just a basic room. My day just got a little better even more. Nothing to pick on but would be good if there is discount for room guests patronizing Basilico lunch buffet. It would be perfect if weekend staycation includes a late checkout by 6pm. Once again, thanks Qing Hui the the thoughtful gesture! Your every thought counts.

title: Awesom Hotel & perfect hospitality
desc: Regent Singapore 🇸🇬 is 1 of the best hotel to stay ! Hotel is well maintained & Awesom fresh rooms wit all amenities ! Bathroom 🚽 are well equipped wit all things . Staff is very efficient. Our welcome 🙏 was nice by front office staff . Nice people & nice country .

title: Great staff and lovely hotel
desc: I went to Singapore with my 11 year old granddaughter so she could visit her friend who now lives there. This hotel was great to stay at with friendly staff who did their jobs very well and with pride. This hotel is quite near Orchard Road and the Tanglin Mall which made it very easy to walk to both destinations. Regent Lounge staff were very accommodating and we got to know them quite well. The Concierge was also very helpful. Highly recommend this hotel

title: Great service and wonderful time staying in Regent Hotel
desc: Great service and wonderful time staying in Regent Hotel. Definetely would like to come back to have best experiences. Christi and her team at club were helpfull. Conveniently located to famous shopping districts.

title: Old gem off Orchard Road
desc: The regent hotel remains at the core a luxury hotel just as it has been for the past few decades. Having said that, the lobby does still look the same after all these years which os kind of dated. I love sunday brunches at basilico and they are a must! The ballroom is also pretty old looking and with 2 pillars towards the back of the room. But their winning charm would definitely be their service.

title: Delighted by their service!
desc: We checked into the hotel at night. The receptionist was very friendly and supportive. She gave us information and tips on where to go in Singapore for sightseeing and shopping. The hotel was luxurious and elegant. Our room was spacious and upto standard. The bathroom had a luxe ambience. The bed was confortable and we had everything we need in the room. The breakfast was busy and we had to be in a queue to get a table as it was already crowded inside the restaurant. Yet, the staff managed and handled the guests in the queue very well. There was a good spread of food and tasted delicious. The checking out was fast and we were well supported. Overall, the staff was very freindly and the stay at the hotel was great!

title: Weekend in Singapore
desc: The Regent hotel was fantastic! The staff was very helpful and friendly the in hotel restaurant has great food! The hotel is a short walk to all the great shopping on Orchid Rd. We did the day pass for the hop on hop off bus which has a pick up and drop off point right behind the hotel. My kids and I had a wonderful weekend we would definitely stay at this hotel again

title: Perfect
desc: A perfect getaway classy hotel . Old world charm and elegance. Perfect place to get married in, which we did! Staff at the hotel were just top notch and aimed to please. The perfect place for a romantic getaway . Close enough to town but away from the hustle and bustle Love it

title: Amazing staff, what a team!! The best hotel in Singapore, just loved my stay and will be back next year.
desc: I have stayed at a few hotels in Singapore but the best hotel is the Regent. The team of people working there are amazing, efficient, helpful, friendly, beautifully groomed. The best staff ever! The Regent club is fabulous and staff so welcoming and efficient. I didn't want to leave! Home away from home.

title: 5 star service lovely hotel
desc: With a relaxed old fashioned glam feeling this hotel is in a class of it's own. We had a suite and could not have been happier with it. The staff are 5 star all the way, professional, friendly and very helpful. The décor is reminiscent of the glamourous hotels of the past, wood panelling, luxury furniture and orchids everywhere. The breakfast buffet was a cut above the average buffet with extensive choices. We used the Regent club for the two days we were there and were extremely happy with the service and amenities. Close to the botanical gardens and the shops at Orchard Road.

title: Wonderful pet staycation
desc: I wanted a break from Singapore but couldn't bear to leave my dog behind. The Regent Hotel came to my rescue. It's location is perfect for me. There's Tanglin Mall just next door, Orchard Road for more intensive shopping therapy a 10 min walk away and the Botanic Gardens, a 15 min walk. It offers a great weekend pet staycation package that comes with free in room breakfast dining and provides a bed, bowl, treats and even a toy for my dog. There's even a dog walking map provided! Admittedly, the hotel isn't modern. Its bathroom boasts an old fashioned bath tub with a shower curtain. But its service more than makes up for it. Its staff made me, my 9-year old son, and my 1-year old Maltipoo dog feel very welcome and at home. Everything and everyone was well thought out. There is a

title: Good location
desc: It’s an older hotel and shows it safe. It is in good location though and I found the staff pretty helpful. Surprisingly pleasant brunch in the lobby tea house. Excellent whisky bar. Found the Italian restaurant to be disappointing for service but food was good.

title: NOT A FOUR SEASONS FOR SURE
desc: If you are expecting to stay in a standard one off 5 star then this is a good hotel but certainly not a Four Seasons. Staff is ok but more involvement with guest recommended to make feel welcome. Ordered room service and was not upto mark. I would rate room service 1 out of 5. Bit outdated. Please look for better properties in Singapore.

title: Break in Singapore
desc: Just had a 2 day stop over at The Regent Singapore a four seasons hotel and it was fabulous. I am a coeliac so was very pleased with their care about my food , we booked a club room and that was very good . We will stay there again on our way home from Europe , thank you to all the staff we had contact with , they were wonderful

title: Singapore gran prix
desc: This was our third leg of our three week trip first and last review will follow The hotel was superb staff very welcoming Food was a high standard I recommend high tea and there was plenty to. Choose from at breakfast The rooms where cleaned and lining changed every day We also went to see the F1 gran prix that was excellent very helpful staff getting us in and out I would return to this hotel if we go back to Singapore in the future Thank you very much to all at the regent

title: Poor hygiene
desc: There were ants in my room. At first i thought just 1 or 2 ants was not a serious issue. However, they were around in the room, on desk, bed side tables, the bench even on my bed. I was bitten and woke up twice at night. The most embarrassing was one ant sneaked into my laptop. When i took out my laptop at a client's meeting, it dropped on the table and my client thought it's my pet. I emailed the hotel. They replied and admitted that they did find ants in my room. However, there were no further action taken. This is so ridiculous to find ants in a 5-star hotel!!!!

title: Amazing efficiency
desc: An excellent hotel.Perfect location ,perfect service and very comfortable rooms A great place.Though it is right next to Orchard road it is on a quiet lane and it has a cute little mall( The Tanglin Mall) a stones throw away where one can shop and eat at great quality outlets It has a small but adequate gym and a little pool too. All in all a great place and value for money.

title: Good hotel in middle of Singapore
desc: We stayed at the Regent directly after our long haul flight from the US & Canada and the he hotel was perfect for that. It is also located very close to the botanical gardens and that is one of the favorite things to do in Singapore. On the other side it is an older version of a Four Seasons and probably not the level you would expect from this hotel chain. Nothing really bad, but a bit dated and tired. The little confectionery is awesome by the the way, great coffee and pastries and lovely service. For that I definitely would come back.

title: Big Room, Friendly Staff, Worthy of the Four Seasons branding
desc: Yeah, it’s not a Four Seasons hotel, so what? This hotel has all of what make a good hotel: Big clean rooms (bigger than most hotels in Singapore) & friendly staff at a great value. Those people what complained “This is not a Four Seasons Hotel” can go to stay at the real Four Seasons Hotel, it’s just a few blocks away. But prepare to pay 50% more though. Not to mention the breakfast is great too!

title: Wonderful service
desc: Stayed for 5 nights with my grandma in Regent Singapore.The hotel is surrounded by residence communities. So it"s much quieter than hotels located on orchard road.The staff were very friendly and enthusiastic,from doormen,receptionists to housekeeping staff,I could see smile was on everyone's face.Especially the excellent service of doorman Kumar,when he found one side of my grandma's wheelchair's foot rests was missing, he brought the plier immediately and tighten up the dropping part of the foot rests for us.He was very kindhearted and considerate, my grandma was touched by his gorgeous service for the senior.

title: Excellent service
desc: The Regent was surprisingly good. It is an older property but the rooms were spacious and well appointed. It also boasts a great location close to Tanglin Mall and the shopping on Orchard Road. Most of all though the staff were fantastic at all times. Very friendly. Try out the Manhattan bar for a drink. Well worth it.

title: The great thing about (reading) bad reviews in TA
desc: Is that they so often turn out not to match at all my own experience. Yes it is true the Regent is not brand new, and yes it’s location can be beat but let’s be reasonable people, the rates are a fraction of the cost of its more glitzy peers. The atrium, rooms and bathrooms are well designed and maintained and the service is superb (top marks for the receptionist who gave me the glorious debrief on the Newton Food Centre when I told her that I liked exploring in response to her initial “sales pitch” on the hotel’s restaurants). Perfectly nice pool too (although not suitable for laps) with the same friendly service as throughout the rest of the hotel. Recommended.

title: Excellent--as usual
desc: The Regent is a first class experience, and although not inexpensive, there are other far pricier hotels. It is located near Orchard and has been a regular business stop for years. This was a personal visit and it did not disappoint. I recommend it highly for business or pleasure stays. The staff is always friendly and accommodating.

title: Classic Hotel but Far
desc: This was the first hotel we stayed for the first day in Singapore and I felt in love with this hotel as it was really like colonial style. Also my son really loved the lift. Staff were helpful and polite. They helped me find a taxi to town when needed.

title: Don't be fooled by the Four Seasons name
desc: Stayed at the Regent Four Seasons Singapore for a week in October for work. Do not confuse this property with the Four Seasons Singapore a short distance away. Luckily I did not but I was expecting a bit more from a hotel affiliated with the Four Seasons "brand." First, the location is great - near Orchard Road with all the shopping and restaurants you can ever need. Also walking distance to the Botanical Gardens (perhaps 10-15 mins). The hotel itself is showing its age. It is clean and bright but does need updating in the lobby / public areas and sleeping rooms to match its name as the Four Seasons. Breakfast was wonderful - everything and anything you can want to eat from Asian to Western to local options. Almost too many options. A few restaurants and bars on site as

title: Super Hotel
desc: We stayed at the Regent Singapore Hotel for two days and loved every minute of our stay. Our room was large and well appointed with a very comfortable bed. The breakfast buffet was exceptional with a wonderful selection of food and drink. We highly recommend this hotel for any length stay

title: Very nice. Liked it
desc: I stayed here for few days and I found it really good. Plus points : 1 good veg options available in breakfast and Dinner. 2. Unique thing is they provide one mobile named handy. You can use it for free calling to many countries and local.so no need to buy a Sim here. It's beautiful building.the services are too good.

title: Nice experience
desc: I’ve been there with my partner. The staff is very polite and attentive. From our arrival they always seemed very helpful. The hotel is really beautiful and the cocktails and food are amazing. Definitely we will come back.

title: Service Extraordinaire
desc: I spent 4 nights in November at the Regent and found the old adage so true--it's the people which make a hotel experience memorable. My nonstop flight from LA arrived early in Singapore, yet Peter Draminsky, the General Manager, took time out to welcome me to the hotel with a hearty "we didn't expect you this early.". After our brief chat, I enjoyed breakfast at the club lounge while waiting for my room to be ready. During the next four days, everyone at the club lounge and at Basilico restaurant could not have been more gracious and helpful. They remembered not only my name, but my preferences for drinks and lattes. I also enjoyed spending an evening at the Manhattan Bar and chatting with the bartenders. Their enthusiasm was infectious. It was clear they loved what they

title: A comfortable stay!
desc: Stayed here for 3 nights on a recent business trip. The property is located perfectly near Orchard road. The check in was smooth. Our rooms were not ready coz we had arrived well before the check in time. However we were promptly allowed to freshen up in their fitness centre. The room size was good, the bed size was comfortable as well. The linen were spotless and pillows were great. The washroom is ok size. The rooms were cleaned on time. The room service was prompt. The staff throughout is patient and eager to please, which is a great thing. The breakfast spead was lovely. I enjoyed my time here.Highly recommended

title: Well located with many good points
desc: Located close to Orchard Road which hosts a huge number of mid to high end shops, malls and restaurants of all kinds. Breakfast offered a number of vegetarian options including: - Hash brown or roast potatoes or potato wedges - Grilled tomotoes - Grilled mushrooms - Various salads - Asian - Indian (sambar plus idli or vada) - Various breads - 3-5 types of cheeses - 6-8 types of pastries (muffins, pancakes, croissants etc) - Tea/coffee/hot chocolate Other good points to note: - There is a mini adventure (where they are given a number of questions and areas of the hotel to explore for kids in the hotel) with a prize at the end. Takes less than an hour to complete. - Plenty of power points of various kinds - Complimentary bottles of water daily - If staying 5 days or more you

title: Great service, big room, comfortable bed, good location.
desc: Didn't really do any kind of research on this hotel as it was booked for me as part of a trip for work. So here's my review. My flight arrived in Singapore at 6am local time, check in wasn't until the afternoon, so in order for me to get a a hotel room that early, I needed to buy the night prior. No problem, the company was paying for it, and I can sort of understand why they had to do that. Check in was a breeze, the front counter staff was incredibly polite and got me settled in. Since I came in early, I was able to get breakfast, which was part of my rate. I was given a room on the fourth floor. It was a big room with a king sized bed. No real view to speak of from the room window, but that's ok. Room had a decent sized flat screen TV, a decent desk / work area, and

title: A REALLY LOVELY STAY
desc: Five stars maybe a little generous as the wardrobe doors were very difficult to operate BUT from the moment we arrived the hotel looked so festive, cosy and welcoming. The staff were a delight, nothing was too much trouble for them and the breakfasts were supurb. The swimming pool is not large but well maintained and whenever I went it was not over-run with people. AND, a major plus was that it was QUIET! Even the air conditioning was at a very low decibel!

title: Pleasant stay
desc: This hotel is pretty old but it’s the type that has aged gracefully. The building structure style is a bit old - like the atrium style - but they make an effort to make it look nice with flower pots. The room doesn’t feel old. The only thing in the room that makes you realise its age is the shower in bath. But everything else doesn’t feel dated. The bed is particularly very comfortable. The location is also good. It’s within walking distance to Orchard Road without the heavy traffic. I think this hotel is good value for money.

title: Excellent service from hotel
desc: Very helpful and friendly service crew! Even though it’s not a new and modern hotel, all the facilities are in great condition! There’s a swimming suit drying machine in the changing room, a traditional and modern steam sauna and a jacuzzi behind the changing room. There’s no life guard at the swimming pool but a really hardworking crew to make sure everyone has a sunbathing bench, towel and drinks.

title: Christmas at The Regent
desc: My husband and I had a 3 night trip to Singapore over Christmas and thought this hotel was lovely and in a great location. The staff were helpful friendly and professional, who were all happy to help and the concierge gave advice on the area and helped sort out restaurant reservations etc. Our room was large and well appointed and had everything you could need including a handy mobile phone to make use of during your stay! The Manhattan bar was a super find with friendly knowledgeable bar tenders. Loved Dolcetto for coffee and pastries. The buffet at Basilico on Christmas Day evening was amazing, the cheese room full of Italian cheeses and the very helpful staff who helped us with our selections were fabulous. The hotel pool was a very nice little oasis in such a busy city,

title: Excellent
desc: Very good location. Breakfast was nice. Stayed 3 nights executive suite which was very spacious. Service was very good they gave an early check in on our request. The restaurant at the hotel are also good.

title: Executive Lounge Is what it is about
desc: The hotel seems a bit dated from the outside. The lobby is massive. The room and bed are what you would expect for a higher end hotel. The breakfast buffet is large but not the best of selections. Food even on the hot section is often cold. The staff in the executive lounge are amazing and that is why this hotel deserves such a great review. The food selection in the executive lounge is good but not massive. I recommend paying for the executive lounge upgrade as the breakfast buffet is $30 by itself and the upgrade is $50 per person, with a great happy hour for beverages.

title: Excellent and Romantic Stay at the Regent
desc: My husband and I stayed at the Regent for our honeymoon. We only had a few days in Singapore but the Regent made it unforgettable. As soon as we arrived we were treated like royalty. We decided to book the Regent Club rooms so we had the Club membership. With the Club membership we had our own special check in, free appetizers and drinks during happy hour, and breakfast. The hotel staff made us feel so special by upgrading us to a suite because it was our honeymoon. The breakfast buffet was so delicious. Everything tasted amazing and the cappuccino was the best we've had since our trip to Italy. We were close to a bus stop which made getting around the city so easy and convenient. We absolutely loved our stay at the Regent and will come back whenever we return to Singapore.

title: The Regal Regent
desc: Love this hotel, it’s upscale but also comfortable and not flashy. It has a decent gym, larger rooms and it’s really nice and quiet. It’s about a 1 km walk to Orchard MRT station which is good, the Botanic Gardens are around the corner. It’s close to Orchard Road to be convenient but far away enough to make it peaceful. The staff are very friendly. I’d stay here again

title: Excellent Hotel
desc: Beautiful hotel and very nice staff...Excellent service ..Awesome food. I came this hotel 100 times from last 5 years Keep it up..Excellent worth to stay here....Should visit here whenever come for holidays with family.

title: Fantastic Club Stay
desc: This hotel has been in Singapore for very long but I must say old hotels do have their advantages. My stay at the club suite was really money worth it. Value Booked a refundable club suite for two around 540SGD all in. The best part is 2-4 pm there is tea time, 5:30-8pm Canape and cocktails and also the breakfast. If that is not enough, the room itself is to die for, with a separate living room and 2 toilets ( one with bath tub) , 2 TVs. The total area is about 88sqm. Really luxury. There is a welcome fruit platter, Nespresso Coffee machine, selection of Dilmah Tea. Loccatiane toiletries were provided with all other amenities like tooth brush kit, shaving kit, shower cap, comb etc. Although a little tired and worn out, I personally feel it is much better than paying tons

title: Amazing service and value for money... and the best bar in town
desc: The service throughout the hotel and the attention to detail is beyond what I normally expect. Highly recommended, excellent breakfast and restaurant, and the best bar in Singapore. Although arguably the rooms are outdated, the basic amenities in the room are spot on

title: Peacefully comfortable
desc: One of the best hotels in Singapore. Nice comfortable stay everytime. Pros: 1) Located near Orchard road, a happening place in Singapore. 2) Neat & tidy rooms. 3) Pleasant staff. 4) Redefine service by always doing more than expected. 5) Nature park for joggers at walking distance. Cons: 1) Too minor to be mentioned. Job well done

title: good but something lacking
desc: a good hotel with a good location. room was quiet for the most part except you could here the toilet from the room above you flush in the middle of the night. staff in the lobby and pool area were great. the first room i had the air conditioner/heater blows air right over your head on the bed. not a good thing. i woke up turned it off then had to turn it on as the room was to hot. bit of an argument with the front desk to get a new room. not sure who thought that one out as it is not good. Definetly not a Four Seasons standard

title: Great Hotel, but even better service.
desc: The Regent is not a new hotel, it is not loaded with all the newest technology as some. But what it does offer is a hotel that is geared to taking care of you as a guest. From when we checked in this December our name was used repeatedly by the staff. We stayed on the floor with the Regent Club were every morning were greeted by name and generally remembered what we drank, ate, and more. if you do stay I would recommend staying on the concierge (Regent Club) floor. Breakfast included, as well as complementary drinks in the evening with heavy hors d'oeuvre. Was also just a quiet place to go to read or relax. One Staff member I want to point out by name is Bob. Bod met us at the front door as we arrived. After checking in Bob brought us out luggage and gave us the

title: Fantastic Hotel
desc: We stayed here for 3 nights en route to Australia and were very impressed. Staff throughout the hotel were incredibly friendly especially the concierge desk. On the last night the lady on concierge recommended a restaurant she personally goes to a lot and was the best place we ate at during our time. Breakfast buffet worth paying for as the selection and quality of food is good. Rooms very clean so definitely a 5 star hotel.

title: Absent of minor details
desc: I have recently spent 4 nights with Singapore Regent and had high expectations given that it was managed by the legendary Four Seasons Group. Upon my arrival on 29 December 2018 did I realize that the management by Four Seasons would come to an end by midnight of 31 December 2018. Well, the good news was that I did not see in the short run any superficial effect on the hotel's guests after the changeover.The hotel's building appears old, expecially the lift and the room interior. Having said that, it was well maintained. The breakfast is served on the 2nd Floor in its Italian restaurant. We had 5 people in our group and we occupied more or less the same table during the time when we were there. The table was set in an isolated section. Normally this would be nice as it was away

title: Thanks to receptionist.
desc: 6 of January, around at12 pm. Sorry to forgot already her name, but I would really appreciate her help. I dropped my phone on my texi, so I was in panic, I couldn’t do anything without my phone. So I had to ask her a favor. She was a bit busy, but still she could help me professionally. It was so impressing. She has short black hair with wearing a jacket. It seems like senior position. If I’m right she is singaporean. I love regent hotel’s warm service. Definitely I’ll visit again. Thanks again. Cheers all the best.

title: Be aware of missing money
desc: We enjoyed our stay until on the night before leaving collecting money from the in room safe. Thought I would just double check my money was all there and noticed money missing. Be vigilant with money left in room safe. They told me that we were the only ones who knew the code..but I’m sure there are smart enough people who can get into these safes. So we left on a very negative note.

title: Holiday with family and friends
desc: Cant wait to get back here on boxing day to share this great hotel with family and friends. Been 4 or 5 times now and everything is perfect with this hotel. Location is great as just 2 minutes from Tanglin mall and just around the corner from Orchard road.

title: 6 Months in The Regent Hotel, Cuscaden Road, Singapore
desc: I was fortunate enough to be recommended The Regent in Singapore when I arrived expecting to stay a few weeks. The Trip ended up being the best part of 6 months but this was a first class residence to stay in during this time. From the genial doormen making you feel welcome by name when you arrive to the concierges and the staff and manager of the Regent Club all have one shared ambition to make your stay as happy and comfortable as they possibly can. Additional practicalities : a good little gym with cardio, free weights, sauna, steam room and treatments A great pool and lounging area The premier bar - The Manhatten Bar Great food The Regent Club facility which offers a more individual and vip service and attention. The staff were all incredibly kind and helpful to me here,

title: Excellent room service
desc: the room is very well equipped. Clean! Towerl are replaced daily. The air quality is good. View of the room is great. Lighting is just nice. Highly recommend people to book their president suite. Oh wait i mean their normal room is like a president suite.

title: It is the People behind the success
desc: Again I stayed for some nights in the Regent. This, because of earlier pleasant experiences. The Regent is a great Hotel . But I'm sure there are some more nice hotels. But what makes the Regent really OUTSTANDING is the Staff. So dedicated to make your stay special and so friendly that you feel really at "home". The staff works hard and deserves all the credits. This experience next to everything else the Regent offers makes me come again and again.

title: Great hotel for business stay
desc: Stayed in the hotel for a week on business travel. Rooms are clean and well maintained. The breakfast buffet and lunch had an amazing spread. The hotel is right near to Orchard road and finding taxis/shopping was easy. The in-room dining also has a good variety. The check-in/out was quick and the staff was very helpful.

title: Absolutely an amazing experience!
desc: We recently stayed in a room that had "club" privileges and man oh man what a treat that was - free hot breakfast in either the main buffet room or in the exclusive club room; High Tea every afternoon with sandwiches and desserts; and then a wonderful dinner buffet each evening with open bar. We saved a fortune and got to meet some of the loveliest hostesses ever - Leting and Kim were awesome (filling our wine glasses again and again and seeing to whatever we wanted from the buffet.) We are going back to Singapore again and I will definitely book a club room at the Regent!

title: excellent service and beautifully maintained property
desc: All of the staff was very helpful. Specially sri who made arrangements to look after my 5 year old very last minute so I and hubby can have few drinks at manhattan bar. Food was excellent both breakfast and high tea. property is well maintained. Rooms were very clean. highly recommend to anyone planning to stay in Singapore. Most tourist destinations are also 15-20 mins away by taxi. Plenty of shopping and food place right outside hotel too.

title: Grand (but old) hotel, excellent location, good service and facilities
desc: EXCELLENT - Large spacious rooms. Super comfy firm beds, premium linens, Loccitane amenities. EXCELLENT - Grand massive entry/lobby and atrium in the centre of the hotel with rooms on the perimeter. EXCELLENT - Location is in a great quiet area a few minutes walk to Orchard road. Tanglin mall is next door with a fantastic food court, supermarket, cafes and some boutique shops. AVERAGE - Decor is dated and hotel needs a refurb. Carpets, curtains and paint in the rooms all need to be redone and refreshed. This hotel is quite dated but is maintained at an excellent standard. I will always come back for the comfy beds, the size of the rooms, the location and facilities/amenities. Everything is excellent quality.

title: Hotel with good bar & restaurant
desc: Very nice hotel with good location, lobby area was stylishly done but rooms were a bit old. Love the Manhattan bar which is a top bar in Asia / no. 3 globally. They have very good selection of cocktails but expect to pay between over $20 to almost $30 per cocktail. The Basilico serves excellent lunch & dinner buffet. However, the breakfast was disappointing as the spread was not as good as any typical 5 star hotel in Singapore.

title: Outstanding customer service in high quality environment.
desc: The standard of customer service that I encountered at The Regent was outstanding. From the moment I stepped out of my taxi I was made to feel special. My room was on the eighth floor of the the hotel and was very well equipped: large, comfortable double bed with choice of pillows; sitting area with armchair, couch and coffee table, desk and chair; and a bathroom that was full of quality materials that emphasised the hotel's superior standards. There was a strong wifi connection in my room as well, and a nice touch was the smartphone that guests could use to find their way around Singapore without incurring roaming charges on your own phone. Breakfast was included in my room rate and provided a wide variety of options each morning, from Asian dishes through to toast & butter. I

title: Best Hotel in Singapore
desc: We had the most memorable Singapore stay ever! My 7 yr old daughter was awed at the “unicorn surprise” waiting in our suite the moment we arrived at the hotel. We didn’t expect it because it was actually a week past her 7th bday. Their Guest Experience Team & Hotel Manager Heiko really did a fantastic job! We will definitely come back!!!

title: Lovely service
desc: This hotel has lovely service and a very nice location in a green and quiet location. The executive lounge provided wonderful meals and snacks and our room was large and clean. I would definitely stay here again!

title: Amazing bachelorette weekend!
desc: We were a group of 5 girls having a bachelorette staycation at Regent Hotel and booked connecting rooms of the King & Twin room. The excellent experience started way before we actually stepped into the hotel as we liaised with Michelle, as we wanted to make some arrangements for our bride-to-be :) Michelle was so friendly and helpful, and was really responsive up to our day of arrival, when she also made an effort to be around if we needed any help. The room itself was great - clean and spacious, comfy beds and nice heavy blankets. Everything you might need is provided for, including L'occitane toiletries, bottle opener, bottled water (which they came in the evening to replenish too) etc. We also had the adults-only cocktail brunch at Manhattan Bar which was fantastic -

title: Luxurious Service
desc: Upon the arrival, the guest services staff took our luggage and they sent to our room within less than 10 min., while we were checking-In. During that time, the front desk agent went further explaining us the Regent Club program which we definitely got in our stay. During the whole stay, all staff paied carefully attention to all calls we did as well as the all enquiries we had regarding the city. By this way, the concierge team provided the adequated information recommending some activities and worthy places to visit. It was our first time in Singapure where we were able to enjoy thanks to all lovely Regent team who help us every day.

title: Magnificent hotel and staff
desc: My wife and I spent 9 nights at the Regent and enjoyed every moment of it. The room was luxurious, well serviced with top quality linen and toiletries. The prime attribute of The Regent is their staff - always friendly, proactive and nothing was ever too much trouble. Due to busy days, we always had room service for dinner. The menu is extensive, the food of excellent quality and portion size and delivery was extremely prompt. There are a number of dining options within the hotel but we only enjoyed the Italian lunch buffet with free flowing beer and wine. Well worth the price. The choices of dishes was mind-blowing and our glasses were never empty. Thank you Regent for a wonderful stay. Very highly recommended.

title: Very nice hotel with excellent facilities
desc: Beautiful hotel and great facilities, with great dining options and an amazing bar. The location is not ideal for business travels, as it is somewhat away from the city center and main office districts. Service is excellent as well.

title: Elegant top class hotel
desc: The lobby of the hotel is spectacular with a central lift shaft to all floors. Our room on 7th floor was excellent, very spacious and immaculately clean, Fruit was provided every day. All the staff in the hotel were extremely friendly and courteous. Bars and restaurants were also first class. The only thing that wasn't top of the range was the Wifi, which was constantly unavailable in parts of our room.

title: Old school elegance
desc: This hotel is dated and in need of a refurbishment, but having said that, it’s still an excellent place to stay. The lobby and main areas are the parts in most need of an update, but they are super clean and huge ceilings give it a grand feel. The Manhattan Bar is one of Singapore’s best and the highlight of a stay. It serves some of the best cocktails in Asia and is sophisticated and classy. A great spot for instagram images. Rooms are very clean and are a reasonable size for Singapore, but really need an update. Currently a large building site opposite doesn’t have great views. The pool area is gorgeous and a great location to chill. Breakfast is served in a gorgeous restaurant which does feel modern and fresh. The buffet is extensive and fresh. The location of the hotel is

title: Perfect
desc: Really lovely hotel and the staff is very helpful and accommodating. The staff were also knowledgeable about places to visit and were super friendly. In addition, they were accommodative of a late checkout as my flight was later in the evening. Will definitely stay there again.

title: Good Hotel for Family
desc: Stayed here for 4 nights 12th June to 15th June with my family and booked a premium and two classic rooms. Location is in a quite place which I personally liked, not too far from Orchard road. Tanglin Mall is a 2 minutes walk from the hotel.. Rooms were spacious, well decorated and the sleep quality was superb. They provided me with a premium room with balcony which I didn't book, that was a great honour rendered. Breakfast was excellent. Bathroom was spacious and well equipped. They hold SGD 1200 for each room as security deposit which is too high as compared to other contemporary 5 star hotels, where they keep no more than 400 - 500 SGD. But in my case they held SGD 600 per room and I am really thankful for that. Only thing I did not like is the standard of room cleaning.

title: Wonderful stay
desc: I went with one friend for the first time to Singapore. We decided to stay at the Regent. When we arrived there we were sorted to the Front Desk and they checked us in. Moreover, we choose to pay an extra to be upgraded to the club level which is worth it. Our room was big however the bathroom should be updated and it is not very big and old. Overall our stay was wonderful and we enjoyed all of the hotel facilities. Breakfast is superb and The Manhattan in great. I can understand why it is considered the Best Bar in Asia. I would like to say thanks to Eric (bellman) who was really friendly and helpful. Thanks to the Regent Singapore for making our stay memorable. I am sure I will go back there.

title: Excellent service
desc: Although the hotel could do with a little modernisation, it was a pleasure to stay here. Staff were great, rooms were quiet and food was very, very good. The concierge team was really helpful and got taxis for me quickly and without fuss and made sure I could pay by card. The shower was good too and I liked the l’Occitane toiletries.

title: Nice & great Hotel
desc: One of my favorite hotel in Singapore. Location in the central and near Botanical Garden, so easy to do morning run over there. Italian resto also good quality and good taste. Rooms quite big and clean. Nice hotel and with orchids inside the rooms.

title: Old fashion hotel but still good
desc: This hotel location is good, clean rooms and big size. Old style but still nice and looks good. The service are good and service also good . Love this hotel. This hotel have good restaurants. For the breakfast is excellent.

title: A Wonderful Hotel In The Grand Style
desc: Stayed here for three nights in June 2019. Loved this hotel, its style, graceful ambience and, most of all, the wonderful, caring and friendly staff at all levels, This is a hotel where one instantly feels at home.Our club access room was huge, very well appointed, spotlessly clean and the king size bed was very comfortable. Had superb dining experiences at the Basilico and the Tea Lounge. The executive lounge was excellent with charming, welcoming staff and a beautifully presented wide range of food and drinks. A very special thanks to Michelle for her efforts in making our special occasion even more special and also to the lovely and caring Yang Li who alerted us to a security risk we had made - exceptional and caring people. Have previously stayed at several other top

title: Wonderful Staff Equals Wonderful Experience
desc: My wife and I had the opportunity to stay at the Regent for over a week and couldn’t have been more pleased with the service and attention that we received. The staff seemed to be able to anticipate our needs and went out of their way to make our stay more comfortable. The Regent Club staff were excellent! From making us feel welcome to helping us with reservations, etc. The Manhattan Bar is a gem and such a treat as well! We’ll be back!

title: Great location and service
desc: The Regent hotel was the perfect place to stay for our short family vacation in Singapore - so centrally located to major sites, nice facilities, and the staff was great - very helpful, responsive and accommodating to our needs. Highly recommend.

title: Paid attention to the smallest detail
desc: Stayed over the weekend to help out at a wedding. While my partner did the check-in, i was coughing away. To my surprise, Guest Experience Manager, Mr Letchumanan Sivasamy, brought a cup of hot honey lemon drink to our room, to help soothe the cough. I’m very touched by this thoughtful gesture. In the evening, housekeeping came by to provide a turn-down service. They also replenished the drinking water, coffee, and tea. The next morning, we had breakfast buffet at the Basilico. Although the restaurant was full and busy, and there were more guests at the door waiting to be seated. the service staff were warm and attended to requests promptly. The chefs were also constantly checking the food and topping up whatever is empty. Thank you so much to the staff at Regent, the

title: Bumped off a Qantas flight, a superb surprise
desc: We got bumped off by Qantas on a long flight to Papeete via Sydney and Auckland, and had to spend a night at the Regent, paid for by Qantas. First, the reception we got was astounding: quick, warm and understanding. Second the food at Basilico was superb as was the welcome (they kept the restaurant open way past the normal time to accommodate the 30 or so people bumped off the QF flight). Mauro, the Basilico GM went out of his way to make us feel comfortable, even giving us a short wine tasting session. This partly mad up for Qantas' cock-up. The room at the Regent was splendid, the bedding superb, the shower a real pleasure, and we regretted having to fly out the next day... Too short a stay, but on our next trip, we will definitely revisit!

title: Good business hotel
desc: Perfect hotel for a business trip with friendly staff. It is walking distance from Orchard street and close by central Singapore. It hosts a very good Indian restauran and one of the best whisky bars of the city, Manhattan.

title: amazing beautiful hotel, great stuff
desc: I got an upgrade. so lucky. great breakfast stunning room and club room. not the best view from the windows and location far from the highlights in the city but definitely more worth to stay than any hotel in the center for what they offer

title: A Fantastic Family Stay At The Regent
desc: Very happy with all aspects of the hotel. Food is superb and service to match with a range of delicacies including an outstanding cheese room. Staff could not do enough, especially a lovely lady named Wendy who catered for our every needs. Pool is also very relaxing and perfect to unwind. Overall myself and my family would happily return as we thoroughly enjoyed our stay.

title: Great stay
desc: Had a staycation recently with my family and it was a great experience. The staff we came into contact (Letch and Malini) were friendly and hospitable . Rooms were clean and comfortable. Brought my infant along and there was a cot with baby amenities provided. A bathtub was provided as well. Thank you Regent.

title: As always, an amazing Regent Singapore vacation
desc: We travel to Singapore frequently and as always, we spent a part of our trip at Regent Singapore. Even though it is a short walk away from the bustle of Orchard Road shopping district, it's well within walking distance of the iconic Singapore shopping strip. The Hotel itself is charm personified. The grand lobby has to be the best feature, with the see-through bubble back lifts in the lobby elevating your luxury experience. The lobby is also beautifully decorated in stunning orchid features. The rooms are nice (though have become a bit dated but are still full of charm). We stayed in both the entry level room and the executive suite, and both are worth the money they demand. Besides the lobby, perhaps the best part of our stay always has been the customer service

title: Pets Friendly
desc: One of the few hotels in Singapore that are pet's friendly. Kudos to the Regent's team. They make you and your family and your pet to feel welcome and comfortable. We got ourself their some sort of pet's package. Come with a gift box for your little furball and $100 dining voucher, so you can call for room service and eat together with your furball (you can order meal for furball too). This might be my 2nd review for regent. Point for Regent to take note, generally the room is excellent except bathroom need to have some refurbishment. Shower curtain had some "funny" smell, likely because been used for quite a fair bit of time. Water leakage and walls peeling. Otherwise, you will be comfortable there.

title: Visiting Singapore on the way back to Europe
desc: Excellent choice in Singapore. Worthwile to upgrade to the club and be able to take breakfast, afternoon tea or a light dinner in peace and quite. Delya was very keen giving full attention to the guests always having a good word and asking if help could be provided. The location of the hotel is quite close to Orchard Road and its shops. We for sure will be back there in case we travel to Singapore again.

title: Great stay
desc: Amazing hotel, really close to Orchard Road and a grab ride away from all Singapore Tourist attractions. Amazing attentive staff and nice rooms with an amazing breakfast spread. Wish the breakfast lines were a bit shorter, but this is a minor detail. Highly recommend staying here!

title: Great hotel
desc: The Regent is my husband’s hotel of choice when he travels to Singapore for business- I can totally see why. We loved our stay- comfortable beds, spacious rooms, great showers and toiletries- the hotel itself is a little older but it is elegant and lovely. The breakfast buffet was fantastic. I also liked lying by the pool our last day- the pool service was wonderful. I will definitely pick this hotel the next time I am in Singapore.

title: Amazing Service at The Regent Club
desc: They don't make hotels like this anymore. Lots of natural light coming in from the top and a lovely sense of spaciousness. Lovely food options, and the highlight has got to be The Regent Club. I would highly recommend paying extra for that option if you can. The service rendered is something I've rarely seen in 5* hotels in recent years; it speaks to an old-world hospitality that I've missed.

title: Corporate Events
desc: Our company organised 2 dinner events at the Regent SINGAPORE on 7 and 8 August including hotel accommodation which our overseas guests enjoyed. Kudos to the Regent team for the excellent service and support over the period leading up to and on the days of the events. Special mention to Hazel Lin for the attention to detail, responsiveness, professionalism and also coming up with a well curated dinner at the Basilico. Special thanks as well to Manuela Forster, banquet managers and their staff at our corporate event for 100 guests at the Royal Pavillion on 8 August.

title: Excellent Service for Wedding
desc: My husband and I held our wedding at Regent last week and we thoroughly enjoyed the Regent experience. From the start, our catering sales manager Alison Ng was extremely responsive and professional in carrying out her duties. Most sales managers have a number of weddings under them but Alison always attended to our needs and got back to our queries within a day. We are also extremely appreciative to the management's understanding of my family emergency and making alternative arrangements at the last minute. On the wedding day, senior captain Mr Anbalagan and team were extremely professional and experienced. My friend in-charge of the AV had no problem working with them. The team was also very confident in directing my husband and I for the event proceedings. There was

title: Wedding and stay at regent
desc: Awesome place to have your wedding and stay in regent. Most helpful sales coordinator - Ziya. Always there helping us with our questions, responsive as always! Helpful banquet Manager and all the service crew are courteous and nice during our wedding and stay. I will come back here again and stay in this awesome hotel. Regards, Joey Chan

title: Well-connected hotel
desc: This hotel is located in the centre of this city-state, close to Orchard Road, the shopping centre, and not far from Singapore Botanic Garden, a UNESCO World Heritage Site. Front desk staff are friendly and helpful. It seems to be a good place for wedding since over the short stay, two weddings were held here. Glad to share their joys over my Singapore visit.

title: Tea Lounge @ The Regent- Impeccable service n great ambience.
desc: 24 Sept 2019. Spanish theme hi-tea this time round. Great spread but even better service provided. The 3 ladies (Mel, Sheila & Girly), I hope I got their names right (pardon my eyesight, the name were in small print) were excellent in customer service and were very attentive. They popped by every few minutes to check on us and when appropriate, asked if we needed anything else. Extremely accommodating n professional. Even their General Manager Mr. Oscar Postma on his round around the different outlets came by and said hello. Wow! Tea Lounge is one of my fav place to have tea. Highly recommended. Here are some photos but I am restrained to only these few.

title: Hi tea
desc: Nice cosy ambience with attentive staff, Ms Shelia is accommodating to our request and knows her products well. They ask carry a wide Selection of teas and coffee. Most importantly their scones must eat, is die to for 👍🏼👍🏼👍🏼👍🏼 Inside warm and fluffy yet outside has a crust touch.

title: What an Incredible Stay!
desc: It's been years since I've stepped foot inside this hotel. I used to work for another hotel company but have left that group; thus I had to choose another property that would fit both my wife's and my needs and likes. And this hotel certainly delivered; the architecture and interiors have certainly stood the test of time given the constant upgrades they have been doing to their facilities. The critical elements though that earned this hotel's 5 star rating from us are the service attitude, the cuisine, as well as the spotless cleanliness! From the time we arrived until the day we left, the staff have all been truly friendly and caring, specially the members of the front office and Executive Lounge who ensured nothing was left unattended as they've anticipated our needs; the

title: Amazing hotel and staff
desc: Absolutely loved The Regent Hotel in Singapore! Location was great, room was large, beds comfortable, bathroom big and well equipped, so much choice at breakfast and it was all very good. The decor is old style glamour and the lifts accentuate this, beautiful but very efficient. On top of all this, you get the most pleasant, helpful and wonderfully efficient staff. Special thanks to Swathi Raj who helped us and Ezzuan the Concierge team leader who kindly helped us check in online for our onward flight.The kindness and generosity you both showed us was greatly appreciated! If we come to Singapore again, we will definitely stay here and I have already recommended this hotel to my friends.

title: Love this Hotel
desc: This hotel is in a great location.....very close to Orchard, but removed enough that you don't have the hustle and bustle of all the visitors. Restaurants are very good and reasonable. Staff is top notch! The room I occupied was on the higher level, and although they were renovating, it was not so intrusive that is created a problem. The properly is very pretty and I noticed a couple of weddings were being held at the site during my 10 day stay. I would definitely stay here again!

title: Spotless room, great food and beverages and awesome service
desc: This is one the best hotels I ever stayed all over the world. Hotel might not be the most modern one but they do pay attention to details. The hotel room is spotless; they have good choices of food in the hotels; hotel service from doorman, front desk, restaurant managers, room service are all friendly and kind. Definitely will be the hotel I stay for my next visit in Singapore. Highly recommended.

title: Wonderful and comfortable stay
desc: Stayed for a couple of nights in this wonderful hotel and it was a pleasure. The front desk staff was very accommodating and the room service was very prompt. The itself was very large compared to Singapore standards, with comfortable king size bed and and extremely large TV, the upholstery was very beautiful also. The bath was clean and well maintained with a super comfortable bathtub. Must also mention that the toiletries provided were top class. Thanks to their staff for accommodating our request for early check-in and late checkout. Very comfortable stay overall.

title: Pet friendly hotel
desc: It’s was a fabulous experienced we had during our staycation to celebrate my husband birthday. The staff was very attentive and friendly, from time during reservation up to check out. Aside from that my puppy dog enjoyed as it’s a pet friendly hotel. Well recommended!

title: Amazing wedding and hotel stay
desc: Andy from Basilico was really helpful and friendly right from the start when we enquired on the possibility of holding our wedding at the restaurant. He was very patient even though we had lots of questions! Apple took over when Andy was on leave and she did a good job too. We enjoyed ourselves very much during the wedding. But one thing to improve was the food. We opt to change some Western dishes to Chinese dishes. The Chilli Crab with Mantou was a let down, my guests feedback there were no crabs, just a pot of chilli sauce. First serving of the Cod was well executed, but subsequent servings were not as good. But otherwise, it was all good. Suite provided is very spacious and clean, enough to house 3 women to do their makeup and also other family members to rest. Overall it

title: Great location
desc: One of the best hotels recently visites in Singapore. Quiet behind Orchard Road, perfectly located in the heart of Singapore Great restaurants, lunch with a cheese room!! very friendly and accomodating staff

title: Work/Pleasure
desc: Been to Singapore many times, but first at Regent Singapore. Staff were super nice! They were very thoughtful and accommodating to the guest, especially Adam Ng at VIP Lounge. Mahalo Adam for your attentive excellent service. Room was very clean and big, bed was super comfy. Breakfast was excellent!

title: The regal Regent Eperience
desc: My partner and I spent 5 nights at the Regent Singapore over the Christmas break. From the time we checked in to the time we left, we were made to feel very welcome by the Staff at Reception and the Regent Club. The service in the beautiful Lounge was excellent, professional and efficient. We appreciated the gourmet offerings and felt very pampered by the friendly Regent Club Team. Room was very comfortable ( L'Occitane toiletries!) although the toilet seat was quite low. Hotel is in a great location within walking distance of the Singapore Botanical Gardens and Orchard Road. A very elegant hotel and first class service provided by the wonderful Staff. Thank you for a memorable stay! Kathryn Tan & Ken Kirkman, Darwin, Australia

title: Amazing Staycation Experience!!!
desc: It was the first time we are staying here and the experience was amazing!!!Special shout out hotel staff Mr.Letchu, he still recognized us even when we met at other property years ago.He greeted us at the front door and assist us with the check in process with make it fuss free and efficient!!The room was clean,the king bed was huge and comfortable,amenities was fully equipped and the smart tv was a great addition to the room. We will definitely be back again!!!

title: Splendid!
desc: It was the most wonderful 2 nights stay my family and I had, check in was fast, the room is very clean,and one of the staff told us it was a newly renovated room. The housekeeping staff had done a very great job, they even check with us if everything is okay or needed anything. The next day, after we went for breakfast at the Basilico Restaurant, we went back room and rest for a while , and the room had already been tidy up. We also receive a 3 tier dessert from the duty manager Ms Jessica Tan thank you so much and keep it up the good service

title: Above and beyond
desc: We held our wedding 3 weeks ago at the Royal Pavilion ballroom. The ballroom was beautifully dressed up and they had LED walls too! Special thanks to our wedding coordinator, Willius who took care of us since a year ago when we signed up. He was always willing to share his pro tips, professional and always reminding us of certain milestones in our planning stage. Our wedding went as planned and well on the actual day and that made our guests and ourselves so happy. We definitely regard him as the go to person for wedding coordination. Heartfelt thanks to Chef Albert and his team for preparing the food that is largely raved by our relatives and friends. Thank you to Brendan, Arthur, Mei Yin and the entire banquet ops team whom we apologise for not being able to get your names

title: Friendly and Helpful
desc: I would like to thank Adam Ng of Regent Club, for his helpfulness while our company was taking photos for our company. He has also a sense of photography composition that he shared with our camera man, during our photography session. Adam, being tall person, helped our camera man to stabilise himself while taking a high angle view. Thank you Adam for your help.

title: Superb!
desc: We experienced a swift check in upon arrival at the front desk and was brought to our room immediately after. Meticulously clean, everything was perfect. The bathroom was stocked well and provided top quality L'occitane amenities. Rachel, the Hskp Assist. Manager even took note of our anniversary and arranged complimentary cake and champagne and even took the time from her busy schedule to meet us personally. During our stay, we were curious about the Club Lounge and we were brought there to take a look. We met Adam at the lounge, who was gracious enough to show us around. We had a fabulous stay, and we look forward to returning to celebrate future special occasions.

title: Wedding Stay
desc: My wife and I booked a number of rooms for ourselves, our bestmen and bridesmaids for our wedding. We were given a significant early check in and the rooms were spick and span. The service by the staff was exemplary at every level with a special mention to Saraswathy who catered to all our needs and requests with absolute efficiency. We loved the stay and we would return in a heartbeat. Value for money!

title: Wedding on 22 Dec 2019 (Nassim)
desc: Held my wedding at Regent (Nassim Room) on 22 Dec 2019. Some coordination issue surfaced, etc wrong carpet colour, wrong door gift but it was quickly resolved. No big hassle or disruption to our wedding flow. Appreciate Ziya, Chua (Audio) Shahril (Banquet Coord) and team to make this event a fruitful and meaningful for our friends, families and relatives who came to give us their blessings. Not all plans will go smoothly but their on the spot rectification is on point and made impossible possible. Once again, great job to Regent team and have a blessed Festive Season ahead. Cheers, Newlywed from R529

title: Birthday staycation
desc: Best surprise with the birthday cake prepared in the room. The suite was amazing! Plenty of room for the 2 of us! In room dining was satisfying. Food was quite pricey but having breakfast in the comfort of our own suite, we can’t complain. Splendid!

title: thank you
desc: Due to the early flight from Singapore on 8th, I have no time to have dinner. I would like to thank Diana for her reasonable and careful breakfast packing arrangement for 15 people in the first time to ensure the smooth return of our team to China.

title: Regent Hotel
desc: A gem in the heart of Singapore! Located close to public transportation, dining, and shopping. Everything is first rate from the welcome experience, to the rooms, the wide variety of bars and restaurants, excellent fitness center, and great executive lounge.

title: Terrific hotel. Outstanding Lounge.
desc: As an airline pilot I get to travel and stay at many different hotels. During my career, one of my favourite destination has been and continues to be Singapore. Additionally I had the pleasure of staying in Singapore at many different hotels while on duty night stops. The Regent Singapore definitely ranks as my favourite. The iconic building made many decades ago is a brilliant mix of old world charm and modern amenities. As you walk in and and look up at the central atrium you get a feel of this lovely mix. The rooms are well appointed and quiet. The beds are extremely comfortable with a good selection of pillows. My favourite part of this hotel is the Regent Lounge on the 11th floor. My experience there has been absolutely incredible. Quiet and cosy with a terrific

title: A Wonderful Xmas Eve Gathering
