desc: Me and me family would like to compliment Your duty manager and Lim for her impeccable service. She is really an asset to your property. We have booked 7 rooms for 24-25Dec2019 for our celebration, not only she managed to put all of us on the same level, she even ensured most of our rooms are close to one another despite the hotel is running at almost 100% occupancy. Her customer service indeed exceeded our expectations. Keep up the good work Ms Lim and once again thank you very much for all the arrangement. The only issues we faced was the hot food items in The Basilico Restaurant. Even at 730am on 24Dec Tuesday morning, Congee, Miso soup, fried vermicelli etc, the temperature of the food was just acceptable. Could be due to it was placed inside the cast iron pot and the

title: Nice hotel but...
desc: Dear my friends Thank you so much for the nice experience and wonderful room you guys offer to me and my wife.. also if wanna only for one night I sleep really well in the king size bed and the clima of the place is amazing... if I can share only one thing maybe will be better if staff of the hotel don’t play or talk on the phone during service or when guests walking around the hotel.. and you see the doorbell open the door for you and talking at the phone and don’t care about you... Small mistake but I don’t honestly think make a nice picture of this hotel... I’m also working on the hoteliers size.. I know how much can be hard or tired.. so I thank you all of you guys who make my stay nice and also for all your work... Kind regards Albert Vicard

title: Excellent staycation with our dog!
desc: We had a wonderful staycation with our dog at Regent hotel on 21 Dec 2019. From the moment we stepped into the hotel, the doorman was very friendly and welcoming towards us; greeting us the moment they see us. It really felt special as Singapore does not have lots of dog friendly places. Also special thanks to Diana at the front desk who helped us to check in. She was absolutely amazing, very warm and friendly, making sure that we have everything we needed for the staycation. She was also super thoughtful; sending us a handwritten note and a delicious pie for our wedding anniversary. We totally did not expect such hospitality from the hotel and will definitely return soon! Thank you Regent hotel!

title: Excellent Hotel, Excellent Location, Great food
desc: This is a gem of a hotel. Staff were great. The room was very comfortable and the breakfast buffet was simply the best around. Conveniently located near the top of Orchard Road. This was a grand hotel in the 80s that is showing its age only because of the architecture. It is kind of "High Anxiety" with a huge central atrium and all rooms surrounding the atrium. But though the architecture is a little dated, the hotel has been maintained in perfect condition. It looks like it was recently updated with new furnishings and fixtures. Importantly the room was immaculate, the beds were very comfortable and the bathrooms was phenomenal with multiple shower heads and highest quality personal hygiene supplies. The staff were SO NICE and helpful. Really loved my stay at this

title: Exceptional in every way.!
desc: We have just returned home having spent 11 nights at the Regent Singapore over Christmas & New Year. With so many 5* hotels to choose from, we read hotel review after review before deciding to stay at the Regent Singapore. On arrival, were we pleased and relieved with our choice.! We were made to feel very welcome by the gentlemen on the door, the reception staff were excellent and as our arrival was late evening, our room service was most efficient and the food delivered/served was delicious and hot. We stayed on the 12th floor, the rooms were lovely with excellent house keeping and we were privileged to have access to the Regent Club lounge. We would like to thank very much Adam, Christian, Vynx, Raj, Yvonne and all the team in the Club Lounge for looking after us with

title: Excellent service!
desc: While we stayed in the Regent for three nights, we enjoyed the service provided by the Regent club really much. Especially mentioned Adam Ng at the Regent Club. He made us feel at home and we look forward to stay with the hotel again!

title: Fabulous Service!
desc: A big thank you to the team at the Regent Club for their stupendous service and for taking outstanding care of us during our recent stay in Singapore. We loved the warm welcome each day. Thank you for the Merlion colouring books!

title: Coming home to The Regent
desc: I have just returned from a 4 day business trip to Singapore and felt compelled to write to you to commend you and your team at Regent Singapore. Regent has always been our preferred choice on our visits to Singapore over the last 30 years.Despite it being an older establishment,the personalized service and warmth of the people who have looked after this property over the years have served to keep it on top of its competition. This trip was a little different for me, as there seemed to be an under supply of hotel rooms in downtown Singapore(with almost all hotels being overbooked including Regent)resulting in my having to book an unknown hotel on Rocher for two nights. It was a mistake but I had little choice.After a night I cut my stay short and forfeited one night’s stay.

title: Wonderful Service
desc: I am a pilot. I stay at Regent Singapore twice a month. Services provided by ADAM NG at REGENT CLUB TEAM are above standards. You couldn't expect more. Be it the breakfast or evening drinks, everything is simply great. Keep it up ADAM. WELL DONE. Sajag Singh Sengar Pilot AIR INDIA

title: Excellent Hotel
desc: Stayed for 4 nights and service throughout was excellent. My housekeeper, Jordan was particularly helpful and pleasant. He noticed that i didn't have a mouse pad and provided a complimenary one. Will hope to comeback again! Mr Robert 920

title: Birthday Weekend
desc: From the moment we arrived on Friday until we checked out on Sunday, the Regent team made this stay unforgettable! I was celebrating my birthday and was offered a number of special surprizes throughout the duration of our stay, which really put the cherry on the cake! Especially attentive was our Room Attendant, Yan Li. Never in my life have I received such impeccable housekeeping service! 5 stars and huge thanks, Yan Li ⭐️. A special thanks also to the folks in the Club Lounge for their added care and smiling faces, no request was too much, including a special breakfast request and late check-out. My special thanks to Adam and Vynx, who seem to be running a tight ship on the 11th floor! I absolutely recommend a stay at this hotel for special occasions or to simply unwind and

title: We're back!
desc: It's January 2020 and we're back for a quick visit to Singapore! I accompanied my husband on his quick one day trip and we stayed at the Regent Hotel Singapore again. It was nice to be recognized as a repeat guest and greeted warmly from the time we got off the taxi until our luggage was delivered to the room. The Front Desk agent even gave us 2 bottles of water when she found out we just came from a long flight. All the other interactions we've had at The Regent Club Lounge, the Fitness Center and at the Concierge were equally very pleasant. The staff were all so pleasant and greeted you with a smile! As our departure was an early evening flight, the front desk was kind enough to accommodate our request for a late departure which we appreciated very much. On our next

title: Excellent Place For Staycation!
desc: Mummy & daughter time! Stayed in a Club room with access to the Club lounge. Outstanding service from every member of staff. Best service received in Singapore. Excellent food & facilities in the Club lounge too. Staff in the Club lounge were so lovely & friendly too. Super comfy bed & room. Very relaxing stay. Will definitely re-book again & will be my first choice of Hotel to visiting family & friends.

title: Trip
desc: Terrific services! Fantastic wine and food selection. Special thanks to Adam at Club lounge! Love people and services. Kids are permitted during the happy hour. Big plus. Pizza soup jin. Enough for the dinner and haaot bour

title: Awesome Stay 😎
desc: Just has the most amazing stay at The Regent Hotel Singapore. A beautiful hotel, that truly reflects the essence of Singaporean hospitality and welcome. We had a Club Room and to say that was amazing is an understatement. The staff all-round are brilliant, but in the Club Room on Level 11, they are something else. Make sure you ask for Vynx who is an absolute gentlemen and he will attend to your very needs. He doesn’t forget what you do and don’t like and will attend to anything you require with professionalism, friendliness and nothing is a problem attitude. This hotel feels more like a home! It’s not crowded and not overbearing. It is quite simply Elegant! We stayed for 4 nights and went to Malaysia and were returning to stay in Singapore at another hotel. But

title: Excellent Service Staff
desc: We had an awesome high tea today and everything was 5 star grading. Food was immaculately prepared with very good selection of savoury and deserts. Excellent service rendered at the lobby lounge especially Mgr. Ramesh, who was very proactive and always ready to go the extra mile. A quick mention of Christian and his colleague at the Club floor. Beautiful and well maintained club. Staff like Christian made our visit even more enjoyable. Walked out a very happy customer and will definitely return for the Hotel’s other outlets. Keep it up!

title: Pleasant Ambience and Friendly Staff
desc: We were here for high tea buffet and celebrating our wedding anniversary. Very chill ambience with live music and friendly and thoughtful staff. The food is visually beautiful as you can see from the photos. Wide selection of teas and allowed to sample different ones through the high tea duration. Taste is mostly good. We’ll be back.

title: Great service by Staff
desc: I was visiting the hotel for a lesson hosted in the hotel itself. When I first arrived I was lost and couldn’t find where I needed to go. One of the staff,saw that I was looking around frantically came to me and offered to bring me to the venue. Not only that, he also recommended me places to eat in the hotel and around the area. Big shoutout to Christian for the excellent service!

title: High Tea at the Regent
desc: Absolutely fantastic experience. Sheila made us feel so good and her attention to detail was incredible. The live piano was a welcome addition. If I could give this experience 10 stars I would!!!! Oh yeah....... and the food melted in my mouth!!!

title: Thank you Regent for an amazing stay.
desc: We’ve been here for 6 days on the level 12 suite with Regent Club access. Everyone have been amazing, from house keeping to everyone at level 11 in the Club retreat. Highly recommended stay for families.

title: Amazing service at the Regent Club
desc: My mum and I travelled from Perth to stay at The Regent for New Years, and it was one of the best hotel experiences we've had. The service was amazing with all staff going above and beyond. The food provided in the Club Room was so much more than expected, with a selection of cakes for afternoon tea and a small buffet dinner and free flowing drinks served every night. A special thanks to Adam and his team at the Club Room for looking after us throughout our stay and for making us feel so special. Highly recommended!

title: New Year’s stay
desc: Before I review the room, I’d first like to thank all the staff for making us feel extremely welcome since the moment we arrived. The service was fantastic and all the staff were very friendly! The room too was fantastic. We booked a family suite so it was very spacious. The kids loved being able to sleep in a tent (although it was a bit cramped for two kids and one ended up on the floor half way through the night...she ended up sleeping with us). The hotel feels old though and it lacks the modern feel that I think many of the other hotels of this class offers. However, the rooms were clean, bed extremely comfortable (as were the pillows you can choose to your own taste), the amenities great and the service as good as you will find in any hotel. For this reason, if I have

title: Excellent service and Superb Quality Food at Tea Lounge
desc: I have been patronising Tea Lounge @ The Regent for a good 4 to 5 years now. Though there were changes to the menu but the quality of food are remained top notch. Mr Ramesh and his colleagues were very attentive to our needs. The service team made us feel so welcomed and time spent here at the Tea Lounge are so enjoyable. They have my support and Tea Lounge is my Go-To weekend high tea getaway. Keep up the awesome work team!

title: Birthday celebration
desc: Had high tea and the pastries (scones and cakes) didn't taste nice, and the service was slow. We had to remind the staff a few times for our order and it took a while for our tea and order to come. But the Chinese food before the pastries were good.

title: Chan
desc: Great services from Shilla, such a wonderful lady, so passionate! Like her smile so much (even with her mask on)! Nice food and tea too!! The blink blink tea (Regent Singapore Blend) is amazing! Nice place to take photos too!

title: High tea at Tea Lounge
desc: Excellent service by Ramesh and team. The spread and taste are fabulous. Will defintely come back and recommend to others again. A very happy afternoon for me and mum. We were so stuffed and full. Thank you!:)

title: Tea Lounge with Mr Ramesh and Team
desc: Lovely, Friendly and above all Professional. The food is fantastic and all of us felt like home. Its so cosy and love the environment. The service is one of the best I have experience. We will definitely be back. Thank you

title: High Tea at tea lounge
desc: Fantastic team that gives excellent service! Well done Ramesh amd team! Will definitely come back! Great ambience too! Seafood soup and stewed tomatoes tasted great! Needs improvement on turkey and beef though.

title: Surprise dish at the end of the Weekend High Tea Buffet
desc: Brought my wife here for wedding anniversary. Had a pleasent surprise when Alice came with a slice of cake. Thanks for the experience! Excellence service. Nice ambience. Great food, love the congee 👍

title: Excellent value for money and great service
desc: Came with 3 other friends and we loved the high tea! It has been a very long time since an a la carte buffet defeated me. Of particular excellence were the char siew, scones and roast beef! Would have ordered refills but so full right now...

title: Amazing weekend high tea experience
desc: Good spread of Asian local delights and high tea savory sandwiches and sweets desserts. Perfect for the not so-sweet-toothed me. The service was warm and welcoming. Ramesh absolutely made the experience another notch higher with his attention to detail and impeccable service. 👍🏻👍🏻👍🏻

title: Afternoon high tea set at Tea lounge Regent
desc: Good service from Sheila ! Thank you for the great service! quality tea & food. Free flow tea and food are refillable. I will definitely come again with my family and friends. Keep up the great service Sheila!

title: Good Food, Excellent Service
desc: Delicious high tea, a good variety of savoury and sweets with 2 rounds of coffee/tea. We love the apple tart tartin very much. Attentive and excellent service staff as well! Lovely ambience and will definitely be back.

title: High Tea @ Regent Hotel Tea Lounge
desc: Service by Sheila is great! Food is delicious and refillable. Tea is of quality and best is, it is free flow! Love the special regent tea. I will definitely come again. Thank you Sheila for the great service.

title: Diwali afternoon tea
desc: Awesome customer service by Sheila, who helped to adapt the menu to cater for vegetarian. The drinks kept flowing, and the food portions were very generous. Highly recommended for the afternoon weekend tea!

title: Excellent service and food at the Regent hotel
desc: Splendid selection of food for high tea and the service from the staff were remarkable. The whole team working there during the afternoon high tea session were remarkable with their promptness in service. Special thanks to Sheila and Chef Chong for their attentiveness and engaging with the guests. Totally love the afternoon time spent there

title: Excellent service
desc: Had an excellent afternoon tea on Christmas Eve. Especially love the hot food such as kurobuta pork and seafood congee. Service was top notch even for such a busy day. Manager was very friendly and offered creative photography shots. Thanks!

title: Great customer service!
desc: Great customer service! Enjoyed the afternoon high tea with my daughter.Food was delicious. My only suggestion would be to have less food (tailored to the table).It was too much food for 2 of us :-0 Happy New Year.

title: High Tea at The Tea Lounge
desc: Excellent service and food quality at Regent The Tea Lounge. Never fail to disappoint even at this tough situation due to Covid-19. The food is yummy, service staff always ready, around and friendly service.

title: Best Festive High Tea
desc: Our go-to high tea venue for all precious and important events in our life. Perfect service, top notch food quality! Suseela is our favourite staff, she make us feel at home every time we return; excellent service standards that is rare nowadays.

title: High Tea at the Tea Room
desc: My family and I visited the Tea Room during the Holiday Season. Due to the pandemic the buffet concept has been replaced by table service with generous portions. The food was amazing and the team led by Ramesh were wonderful! Brilliant service! Highly recommend!

title: Perfect high tea spot in SG
desc: Highly recommended, especially for the weekend high tea. Good ambience and we enjoyed both the sweet and savory items. The service team was very attentive - Shoutout to Mr Ramesh for the great service!

title: Impeccable Service
desc: Impeccable service by the team at Tea Lounge, especially by Ramesh & Sheila. Have been coming here for Christmas without fail for the past few years. Just feel so welcome & homely! Food is great too. -Evelyn

title: Nice food and ambience
desc: Great ambience with friendly waiter and waitresses. 2nd time there, still feels good. Will definitely be back again. Need to book in advance to avoid disappointment. Food presentation good, serving hot. Wonderful tea selection too!

title: Amazing experience
desc: First time experience with high tea, and I am blown away! Wonderful array of tea and pastries. And the excellent service of the Regent crew! 10/10 will come back again! P.S. was even surprised with how social distancing was enforced in the gents. Truly amazed!

title: Fantastic high tea!
desc: We came to celebrate our birthdays and had a splendid time! Would definitely go back again for the great service. The food was really good and I particularly enjoyed all the savoury selections. We had seconds and thirds! :)

title: Tea Time - Dec 2020
desc: Best place to spend a sumptuous tea with friends and family. Lots quality foods. The staff specially Shiela gave a world class service. Kudos to the staff and team for giving us a wondeful experience!

title: High Tea at Tea Lounge
desc: Special mention to Sheila for her impeccable service! We had a great time on a saturday afternoon. Food is good too, not to mention efficient and welcoming. Definitely come back if i can get a booking!

title: Great service staff with super friendly smiles and funny jokes!
desc: We had a weekday afternoon tea at the regent and was served by multiple friendly hosts including - Sheila, Joan, Mel, Miffy, Anbalagan. They were all absolutely fantabulous! The team were jovial, making us feel at home this festive season. What a great time be alive! Thumbs up to the team! 👍🏻👍🏻👍🏻

title: Superb service, can't ask for more !
desc: Love the afternoon tea, value for money especially since it's freeflow, not many afternoon teas in Singapore are free flow these days. Standard isn't too bad, scones are the best. Service was superb, Ramesh at the tea lounge and the chef Luca made special arrangements to accommodate my dietary restrictions at the last minute and I really appreciate that gesture. Highly recommended for a nice, chill afternoon with a good ambience. Best wishes, Alison & Steven

title: Weekend High Tea Buffet
desc: The crews had enforced good social distancing and table arrangements. All food were served to the table instead of buffet style. We enjoyed the good ambience and very attentive service from the crews. There were tasty fusion local and western food ends with high tea set. There are quite some tea selection too.

title: Afternoon Tea at the Tea Lounge
desc: Really delicious high tea and excellent service! One of the best in Singapore, highly recommended. There's both hot dishes and high tea, so something for everyone. The manager is super friendly and made sure we were well taken care of. Thanks again!

title: Friendliest staff and amazing weekend afternoon high tea
desc: The sweet and savoury food were equally good. Local food like laksa were tasty too. Friendly and attentive staff who kept checking on us to make sure we were enjoying the food. Would definitely return for another session!

title: My daughter’s 21st birthday
desc: My daughter always wanted to experience what’s the ‘real’ high tea all about. I decided to bring her one on her special day. After reading so many reviews and articles such as; ‘Best 20 places for afternoon high tea in Singapore’ ‘Best High Tea Spot in Singapore’ after the comparisons,I decided to bring her to Tea Lounge @The Regent. I am happy I made the right choice and she really enjoyed it! We were served with a smile and an explanation on all aspects. That makes my daughter feels good in her first experience. The desserts were decent. Delicious sandwiches and the macarons were spectacular. Tea selection was relatively extensive. When they found out it was my daughter’s birthday they gave us a special cake! A great credit to Mr.Ramesh and Ms.Sheila, they constantly

title: Excellent high tea... so satisfying
desc: Had to wait 3 weeks to get this booking but it was totally worth it. Good mix of savoury dishes and sweets, and the kurobuta char Siew and king prawn congee were too good to stop at one portion 😋 Service staff were warm and friendly. Special shout-out to our server Sheela with her cheerful smile. Will definitely be coming back.

title: High tea buffet at Tea Lounge
desc: Impeccable food and service. Love the char siew. Will return. Thanks for the entire team for the great service and supporting the relaxing mood for a sunday afternoon, great time with my friends catching up.

title: Enjoyable by chance experience
desc: It was intended to be a catch up over coffee and pastries at Dolcetto but as I had skipped lunch and was quite hungry, I navigated my friends to the tea lounge instead hoping to grab a meal over coffee. Fortunately they had an available table for us after Ramesh explained the menu and that they could serve only drinks without food to my friends. What a good choice to feed my hungry stomach - honey roasted char xiu, laksa, fried chicken, grilled salmon, asparagus in soup, lobster porridge, a tray of medium rare roast beef with Yorkshire pudding and to end it all, cut fruits and a 3 tier tray of small sandwiches, cakes, quiches & scones with clotted cream and jam. I cannot forget the wide variety of drinks with 2 refills, what a heavenly time just enjoying the full menu with

title: Best high tea with impeccable service!
desc: The variety at the Tea lounge definitely has us keep coming back for more! Food is cooked to perfection especially the seafood congee. Special shout out to Sheila for her impeccable and attentive service. We will be back!

title: One of the best afternoon tea.
desc: One of the best afternoon tea. Food are nice, and very nice ambience. The waitress, Sheila, is very friendly and attentive! A very good afternoon tea experience. Will definitely visit again! Love the tea selections too.

title: Weekend hightea
desc: Regent Hotel is the go to place for me for me and my friends for a weekend hightea. The food and service is excellent. Thanks got Rengent and all the staff for your warm hospitality. I always feel at home in Tea Lounge.

title: Weekday afternoon high tea at tea lounge
desc: Lovely place with cozy ambience. Food was delicious and available for top up. Each person gets to order two drinks and the gryphon tea selection was extensive. Staff were very attentive and gave a personal touch. Great customer service. We look forward to being back here again.

title: High Tea
desc: Very nice food and tasty. I would like to commend a very accomodating server her name is staff Sheilla. Very cheerful and always making sure the the customer is happy and having a great time. She provide very good service.

title: Dinner @ Regency Hotel
desc: Very friendly service , caring and attentive. The waiter ,Pren will take time to explain diff type of wine n food. The ambiance also very welcome. The service exceeds expectations. Will come back surely

title: Weekend High Tea
desc: We thoroughly enjoyed our weekend high tea! We appreciated the generous servings of delectable savoury and sweet items prepared by Chef Chong and his team. The house made scones, served warm, were too good to pass up, even on a full stomach. We would also like to commend the manager Ramesh and his team (especially Sheila and Alice) for their excellent service. They were personable and professional, and really took care of our requests. We will be back again for this winning combination of an amazing high tea spread and warm service!

title: Very good quality lunch experience
desc: Needed to have a peaceful and lovely lunch. Came to Summer Palace at Regent Hotel and was thoroughly impressed by the quality and standards of food and service. The value was also great. The restaurant was peaceful and with the view of the garden added a truly zen like feeling that helps to soothe the anguish of covid restrictions in Singapore. I will return again soon.

title: Tea Lounge
desc: Had Regent’s high tea some time back in October. Alice’s (hopefully i got her name correctly) was very thorough and friendly throughout the whole high tea service. Ambience was fine and food was great. Fire alarm went off a couple of times but wasn’t an issue.

title: Birthday high tea
desc: Absolutely love the high tea here. Service by Sheila was excellent beyond words!!! She even offered to take many great photos for us. The food served here bears many of the other high teas that I have been to. Definitely recommend this place!

title: Summer Palace
desc: Delectable cuisine and a comfortable environment. Service is impeccable; staff are attentive and considerate, offering suggestions on how I may enjoy my chinese tea better. A place that my wife and I will certainly visit again...and again.

title: Attentive and friendly service with great food
desc: The food is great, a good mixture of sweet and savoury items. We are returning customers and honestly the food and service never disappoints. Special mention to Sheila, Alice and Mel for making the afternoon such an enjoyable one! Thanks for the birthday cake too!

title: Fantastic service
desc: Enjoyed the afternoon tea tremendously! Food is replenish-able, subject to availability of course. Service was impeccable, as expected of a 5 star hotel! Great introduction and service from all the staff. One of the staff had some difficulty taking photos as it was rather bright (hot afternoon) - was no biggie actually. When the other staff found out, they helped us to recreate the moment when we were first served, spared no effort to help us take a nicer photo. It was also our honeymoon and they also blessed us with a lil cake. Food was also pretty decent! Quiche came freshly made and was delicious! Loved the variety available for the food items. Overall, loved the service and the quality of food.

title: Excellence service👍
desc: Had birthday high tea...Alice is such a wonderful darling...my friend and i vote her for best service award...🥰 along with the rest of the staff here. They are full of smiles and friendly and polite and always checking on us if we need anything else. Will definitely come back.👍 Love u all guys.

title: Afternoon tea
desc: Thank you for the impeccable service. From securing our booking to the actual day, everyone was so helpful and accommodating. Special mention to Sheila who was very kind and attentive and always checked on us. Such a gem. Thanks for the great experience, we will be back :)

title: Afternoon high tea
desc: Great service from Charlene and Sheila, very prompt, courteous and helpful. My friend was expecting and so couldn't take some raw items, they were very kind to provide an alternative dish for her even without our asking. Drinks and water were always filled and we did not need to wait long for the service. Complimentary parking as well. We will be back!

title: Hi Tea at Tea Lounge, Regent Hotel
desc: Me and daughter had a great time at the Tea Lounge. It’s my favorite Hi Tea place. The service staff were very committed to great service and were very friendly, especially Sheila. Most importantly the food tasted great as always. The food presentation was excellent. I would highly recommend it.

title: Phenomenal Experience At The Manhattan, Regent hotel Singapore
desc: Twice in two weeks! That’s how head bartender Kelvin of the Manhattan bar in regent hotel Singapore got us hooked to his excellent cocktails. His knowledge and recommendations were spot on. He even managed to convert the Mrs who were never a fan of cocktails and whisky. Ultimately it is his impeccable service that sums the entire experience into a perfect one. It’s the likes of Kelvin that make Manhattan deserving of being one of the top bars in Sg.

title: Good food and great service
desc: Lovely ambience with helpful service staff, Harold, pair with good quality food. Great pacing of dishes and attentiveness of Harold made the weekend lunch a delectably satisfied experience. Would most definitely recommend to try.

title: Pleasant afternoon
desc: It was a last minute decision and what a pleasant surprise!! The food was good and the service by Ramesh made it even better. This is definitely my go-to place for high tea. Hope that we can have the cheeses once SMM measures eases.

title: Staff to look for
desc: Staff was very nice and pleasant. Alice took effort to ensure our photos are nice and refilled our plate to make it looked full 😄. Alice also took the opportunity to ask if I have certain bank card and get entitlement to the discounts. Entire ambience is very lovely and nice too. High tea food is refillable if you need it. You are entitled to 2 free drinks for the high tea.

title: Dinner - Basilico
desc: We usually go to Basilico (Regent Hotel) for our Sunday dinner as we find the restaurant setting rather pleasant & relaxing (cosy)! The food is consistently well prepared & nicely presented by anyone of the 3 chefs namely : -Lucca, -Valerio -Peter Choong Service is excellent as the waiting staff is friendly, courteous, helpful & attentive!! -Sunil -Apple -Shaern -Anna -Claudine Mrs Rebecca Bengtsson (“Happy Diner!”)

title: Ms
desc: Great experience here for the weekend high tea. Celebrated our anniversary here. Excellent food and drinks. Love the seafood congee and beef. A good mix of savoury and sweets. Service was commendable too.

title: Weekend High Tea @ Tea Lounge
desc: Awesome food, one of the best high teas I've had here in Singapore. Service was impeccable as well, service staff was attentive every step of the way, my tea cup and prosecco glass were never empty. Thanks for a wonderful experience.

title: Great high tea experience
desc: I took my daughters for their first high tea experience this afternoon at the Tea Lounge and we were all blown away by the amazing service. Anba and Ramesh were very attentive and professional while Sheila was such a joy. All of them had great initiative and would check on us at comfortable intervals. The good food and outstanding service by the entire team made it one very pleasant experience for us. We would definitely return again.

title: Birthday
desc: Came on 20th Nov for my sis birthday. Alice was a very nice and friendly staff. Helped us to take nice photos as there was a cake for my sis, arranged the 3 tier stand to capture a nice shot. Overall, the ambience is nice and cosy.

title: Jas
desc: Came here 2x within the same week. I really like the ambiance and food. Service was excellent. Our server Kai Ming was very attentive and polite. Love the selection from the Tim Sum menu. Definitely will be back again.

title: Wholesome Joys
desc: Came here for high tea with my wife. Delicious food served here! Ambience is great as well. Delightful dishes from warm tarts to cold desserts. Will definately come back for another meal if time permits!

title: Festive Weekend Afternoon Tea - Worth Every Penny!
desc: Festive Weekend Afternoon Tea - Great experience, lovely food and top-notched service! Special thanks go to Sheila who was so cheerful, passionate about her job and attentive to every of our needs. Food wise, the Individually plated mains were so good! Dun forget to go for the Regent's Signature Tea as part of your experience.

title: Great food and good service attitude! 👍🏻
desc: The food at the Tea Lounge was great and the staff was super attentive and friendly. Food was good and good sized servings. Special kudos to all the staff making the visit a memorable one especially to Sheila who has been super attentive and friendly👍🏻

title: Good food, friendly service
desc: Went to Summer Palace for lunch and had the Michelin taster menu. They have changed the dishes for November; double boiled pumpkin soup is no longer available but the remaining dishes are great nonetheless. Was hosted by Harold whom, as always, is warm and attentive to us. Will definitely be back!

title: Tea time at the Reagent
desc: We had a wonderful time having high tea at the Reagent, great service, great food, simply superb. Thank you very much for helping me celebrate my wife's birthday, she had a great time and we all feel like this was spot on!

title: Birthday celebration
desc: Had a wonderful time here at tea lounge. Tea was awesome and the staff here are very friendly and approachable. A big shout out to Ramesh for the warm hospitality! Highly recommend couples to come here for festive celebrations.

title: Summer Palace
desc: Amazing food, beautiful ambience and friendliest staffs. Highly recommend! Staff was nice enough to cater to my preferences, gave super great recommendations to make my dinner experience a pleasant one. Thank you for the wonderful experience. :)

title: Awesome food and service
desc: Food was good and the great service too! The staffs here are very friendly and attentive. Quiet and nice environment to spend quality time with friends. The set dinner not too pricey and it’s worth the price! Definitely will come back again!

title: Afternoon tea at Tea Lounge
desc: Had weekend afternoon tea at Tea Lounge. The food is fantastic and the tea selection is awesome. The Regent tea is a must try and so is the milk oolong tea. Ramesh and his team were extremely hospitable, checking in on us regularly to see that we are comfortable.

title: Compliments, very friendly staff
desc: Nice ambience :) Very good service by the staff here. Thanks Ramesh, Anba & Sheila for the warm, attentive & great service :)) Thumbs up!! Will definitely revisit because of the warm staff here & nice food:)))

title: Friendly and lovely Staff
desc: Went the weekend hightea buffet for birthday celebration. Cozy environment, good food, friendly and lovely staff,they will keep check on you see if you need any more food or assistance. A Staff Alice put her effort to arrange the table just to help us get nice photos,also thanks to on duty staff Amin,Charlene,Ramesh and Sheila. Highly recommended and definitely will back again.

title: Excellent High Tea
desc: Service is extremely attendance, warm and accommodating. Relaxing atmosphere. Food is beautifully presented and way more than any human being could possibly eat. Very good value for money. A great place to bring a small family or date.

title: Fantastic staff , Spacious rooms , Good food
desc: I stayed with my wife and my 2 year old kid for a 10 day SHN at The Regent. The hotel staff did their absolute best to make the stay as comfortable as possible. They were extremely helpful in setting up my office equipment so I that I could work hassle free during my quarantine. The size of the room and balcony is good, makes the stay pleasant. The chef is fantastic and caters very well to specific dietary requirements. Me and my family were genuinely worried about being locked up in a hotel room, but I was left thoroughly impressed by the staff of the Regent.

title: Cheese and Wine delight
desc: We had a really awesome time at Basilico! The cheeses were delicious. Wines were good. The service by DIANA was impeccable. She was highly attentive but discreet. She made the evening perfect. Thank you so much!

title: Afternoon Delight!
desc: We 3 BFFs went to the Tea Lounge for a Festive cum Birthday celebration. Great Christmas-sy ambience, cheery, warm & cosy! Giant Christmas tree and a Candies & Cakes House. The Afternoon Tea came in 3 tiers of savouries and sweets and we had a choice of coffee or tea. The mini triple chocolate éclair, fruit cake and blanc cheese fromage with banana were our favourites. Service was par excellence- Compliments to Ramesh and Sheila who were ever so helpful, attentive and friendly! Sheila even went to the kitchen to check with the chef when we asked her a question about the Blanc cheese fromage, and she helped take photos of us. Ramesh arranged for a slice of cake (with icy passion fruit in between) with a candle for our friend's birthday...that was a nice gesture! Overall, an

title: MAMMA MUA!!
desc: We dined at Basilico Restaurant. The ambience was very nice; food was excellent; and the service impeccable. A special thanks to Diana for attending to us so well; always checking if everything was alright; and if we needed anything else. Her sense of humour was also great. Also to Sunil, who was most professional and attentive to his customers. Finally, thank you also to Head Chef Valerio, who took the time to say hello. We will certainly be back.

title: Great atmosphere and wonderful service
desc: Great cosy atmosphere for a relaxing afternoon. Food was wonderful, especially savouries. The quiche was a standout item which I would come back for. Really awesome service from Sheila :) Her jovial personality brightened up the afternoon tea experience! Thank you.

title: Tea Lounge Afternoon High Tea
desc: Great ambience and fantastic service from Alice. Went the extra mile to take a very nice photo for us, even arranging the items on the table to make an Instagramable photo! Food was good. Needs more savoury items than sweet items I feel. Coffee was superb.

title: High tea at Tea Lounge
desc: Excellent service, lots of food, nice ambience and complimentary parking. Good value for the whole experience. Came with an empty stomachache and left with a food coma. Highly recommended for a slow weekend.

title: Thanks for the surprise birthday cake
desc: Was asking for the birthday cake and been told that it need early inform. Was not expecting got cake for our table but the manager come with a surprise cake. What a wonderful gift ~ thanks you mr. Ramesh.

title: Chinese New Year Afternoon Tea at Lobby Lounge, Regent at Cuscaden Road
desc: We were attentively served by Ramesh on our day of visit. He was professional, approachable and courteous. Nowadays with high turnover especially in the F&B industry, one hardly meets with wait staff who has great customer service and possesses knowledge about the food served. Even though a few of the food items were not up to expectation (the menu was changed at the last minute and not updated timely for our perusal), Ramesh's personal service more than made up for it. Noticed that even during the busy period, staff were generally cheerful and positive while serving guests. Overall, we must say the experience was a good one and we will continue to patronise the hotel.

title: Friendly and the best hospitality
desc: As a good memory, my wife and I visited "Tea Lounge" for afternoon tea before my wife leave singapore. Alice and Mel talked to us very friendly and gave us the best hospitality. Also, I would like to visit here with my wife.

title: Chinese Weekend Hi Tea at The Tea Lounge Regent Hotel
desc: We absolutely loved the sumptous spread! Was a great idea to have both Oriental,Local as well as Western Hi Tea dishes. Some highlights were the king prawn porridge, Beef Mantou, Scones and Quiche and desserts were also fantastic! Thumbs up to their service team Ms Alice and Mr Ramesh for awesome and friendly interaction with us. Thank you

title: Lunch @ basilico with great service
desc: Food was good and service was great. The staff (Vijay) attending to us was really attentive and gifted us a birthday cake, without prior knowledge that we were there for a birthday celebration. Ideal for a quiet lunch out with the family.

title: Afternoon High Tea
desc: Nice ambience and comfortable seat. Staff are very friendly and prompt. Also they served quickly. I very enjoyed their high tea set. Highly recommend their tea “Regent Singapore Blend”. Exceptionally good Aroma and taste

title: Compliment to Mr Shaern
desc: Best waiter in the world right here in basilico. Made us feels comfortable on our anniversary meal Prompt service and eager to help in all our food enquiries Excellent recommendations and brilliant attitude Top notch!!!!

title: Fantastic food and service!
desc: Went to Tea Lounge for their high tea set. Fantastic food and service! Food was yummy all round, and the portions were generous. Drinks were nice too. Iced chocolate is a must try. Service was also great! Amin in particular was attentive, helpful, and friendly. Really enhanced the dining experience. Will be back again!

title: Manager
desc: I went for lunch with my friend at the lobby lounge. I wish to thank Mr Amin for his awesome hospitality services during our time there. He is very efficient and prompt when requesting for my meals and queries on my food.

title: Lovely experience at Basilico
desc: Had the semi buffet dinner at Basilico, and it was lovely. The food was excellent and the service fantastic! We had the rib eye main course and it was delicious. Kudos to Vijay and team for the wonderful service! We will return!

title: Restaurant week 2022
desc: Came here for restaurant week 2022, Mr Vijay was friendly, attentive, and prompt with his service i.e. change in plates and utensils in between dishes. Food was delicious, fresh, and a great selection of cheese to choose from and a very knowledgeable cheese expert (didn't get his name)!

title: Afternoon Tea
desc: Awesome service and good ambience. Had their Thai afternoon tea set which is a rather different experience compared to the other afternoon tea served in other places. recommend others to give it a try.

title: Definitely Coming Back!
desc: Had a weekend high tea for 5 at Regent Tea Lounge and our group requested for 1 pescaterian and vegetarian set. The restaurant catered impeccably to our dietary requirements and explained in detail each item consisted of what ingredients. Our vegetarian meal included an ultra delicious plant based meatball which was the best we ever had. Checked with the Manager Ramesh what was it made of and he actually went the extra mile to give us a call back after he managed to find out from the busy chef. All in all food was great, service was excellent and don't forget to try their Regent Singapore Blend Tea!

title: Weekend High-Tea at Tea Lounge
desc: Good food and even better service from an attentive and accommodating team. Good range of options, with unlimited refills. Very good value for money. Kids enjoyed themselves and i will definitely bring the family again.

title: Great door staff and service!
desc: Went for tea again with my friend at Tea Lounge. Would say it’s the best afternoon tea in Singapore for food quality, variety and ambience! Service staff at Tea Lounge were so lovely too. Door staff team at Regent Singapore are very proactive and friendly - guests are welcomed in such a warm and hospitable manner! Keep up the great work.

title: Awesome high tea
desc: This was our first time having high tea at Regent. The food was amazing and not only do they provide delicious savoury food, the sweets were interesting and delicious as well! Thank you to the amazing service staff that were so detailed, patient and friendly which made our experience so wonderful & enjoyable! We would highly recommend this high tea to our family and friends. Thank you all!

title: Outstanding Stay
desc: My first business trip to Singapore and the Regent was absolutely fantastic. We arranged a transfer with the driver readily awaiting our arrival. The hotel is absolutely beautiful with a stunning foyer and entry area. Check in was lovely, with an in room run through of hotel features such as the buffet breakfast. Room was clean, with a plush bed, great water pressure and no hassle that I preferred not to have my room cleaned every day. We enjoyed drinks at Manhattan Bar twice as it really was a top tier experience. Reception provided a cash out service at a great rate and everyone we met was always very accommodating and friendly. We used grab taxis very easily via an app and found that to be the best way to get to meetings etc. We received a lovely note from the team upon check

title: A classic hotel in Singapore still delivering a wonderful experience
desc: Stayed for a week while in Singapore. Great location in a quieter part just a short walk to Orchard Rd. Nice little deli/pastry shop downstairs for a quick bite. Manhattan Bar had some fantastic cocktails. Gentlemen at the front door were always very welcoming going in and out of the building. Lovely stay!!

title: Simple stay made memorable by the various touchpoints
desc: Boasts some of the best bars and restaurants, stay made memorable by the various touch points. The rooms are simple and not exactly your modern take but service and staff awesome. Located in town, a good spot to start exploring

title: Buon appetito
desc: Another fantastic anniversary celebration at Basilico. Our server Vijay’s so meticulous, attentive and professional. He found out it was our anniversary and surprised us with a cake and candle. Lovely. We enjoyed our dinner thoroughly. Ciao!

title: Pan fried kurobuta cutlet with ladies' fingers
desc: Super nice dish. Thanks Mr Harold (waiter) for his recommendation. Our family enjoy it. The way it fried the pork it so much different from normal pan fried meat, I dun think we can find such a delicious dish at other restaurant. Thanks

title: Good Service!
desc: Posh and very service oriented hotel. Love how they treated us equally from check in to check out. The Regent Club food was average and can be improved. Not many choice for breakfast but all the staff deserved all the commendation from their service skills. Love the hotel location and very beautiful interior with spacious room.

title: Summer Palace Restaurant
desc: Went for Summer Palace for dinner. Exceptional service, staff is warm, friendly and gave good food recommendations! Thank you for an excellent experience. Prices are reasonable too..! Ambience is lovely as is the food. Will definitely recommend to my family and friends.

title: Super Hotel with the NICEST Staff!
desc: The hotel is wonderful! Would come back anytime. The highlight are the staff! Everyone is super friendly and warm ! Very special mention to the Front Office Manager Niroshinie and the doorman Chris - thanks a million for making our stay at the Regent so memorable !!

title: Weekday lunch
desc: Good antipasti and dessert selection and reasonably priced menu. Decent by the glass wine choices. Prefer ala carte main courses. Served by Conwynn- keep up the good service. Nice ambience and good for large groups too.

title: Great Service!
desc: Great service and thanks to Ms. Alice, Mr. Ramesh and Mr. Anba! They are very accomodating and thoughtful. Foods are delicious. The ambience is perfect for the occasions. Staffs are helpful. Keep it up! Thank you very much!

title: Review of basilico
desc: Great food. Great cheeses. Great spread for buffet. One has to consider its location and realise that the price point the restaurant is providing presents a great deal. With friendly staff and more than decent spread in terms of both alacarte and salad bar. This restaurant is a great place to go for a weekend meal.

title: Lovely Staycay
desc: I am so pleased that my favourite hotel in SG is open again. We have stayed for 2 nights this week on a foodie Escapade that included afternoon tea and cocktails in The Club room. Fiqar, Yvonne, and Liyana were such wonderful hosts throughout. We had amazing cocktails in Manhattan followed by dinner in Basilico. The service was second to none with the Maitre D leading by example. Food was outstanding. Lastly, Afternoon tea in the Tea Lounge with service by the excellent Alice and Amin. It’s a feast, so much more than sandwiches and scones! We will be back!!

title: Amazing Staycation
desc: Fantastic staycation experiences. The staffs are friendly and genuinely kind. From thoughtful greetings upon entering hotel lobby to personally following up on our requests. The breakfast buffet at Basilico is delicious and sumptuous. We truly enjoy the stays.

title: Tea Lounge
desc: The services of Ms. Alice, Mr. Ramesh, and Mr. Anba are commendable. Foods are tasty too. There are varieties of foods and desserts to choose from. The location of the hotel is also convenient to all people.

title: Remarkable service but a mixed bag for everything else
desc: The stay was very much a mixed bag. Brilliant : Service was the best I have seen anywhere and made up for everything else. From reception to bell people they could not be faulted. The ambience of the entrance and lobby is amazing with magnificent flowers everywhere. Very good: The gym although small, was well equipped and clean and everything worked perfectly. The pool was also small but clean and well serviced. Only just: We booked into a club room which was well worn and quite disappointing. After complaint the “service” kicked in and we were moved to a suite. Much larger and more comfortable but still showing it’s age with the shower in the bath. The food selection in the Club was no more then average. As vegetarians the choice was limited and not tasty. We arrived at the

title: Excellent service by Ramesh at Tea Lounge
desc: We were most impressed by the excellent service and gracious hospitality extended to us by Ramesh, the manager on duty, for our high tea this afternoon. It made the experience so very enjoyable. He took care of our every need, particularly our dietary restrictions for the high tea and came back to us to ensure that our needs were met. Truly remarkable service which made the experience so thoroughly enjoyable. We will definitely be back again.

title: Always wonderful at Summer Palace
desc: Was here with my extended family of 8 to celebrate Mother’s Day / birthday. Food is great as usual and we were again hosted by the wonderful Harold. Harold recommended us the most suitable set for our family size and It’s always a good time to be back at Summer Palace!

title: Staycation
desc: Excellent experience with the hotel and its team. Special shout out to Miss Izzaty and her team for the perfect coordination for my proposal plan to be executed smoothly. Definitely will visit in near future.

title: Classic Five Star Hotel in a great area
desc: Was here for two nights and was very impressed with the amenities and service. It is an older hotel - however, everything is of high quality, and of course, everything works. The front desk team of Fiqar and Goldne were excellent - took care of my issues/questions quickly and promptly. Also, the team at the gym was fantastic as well. The gym is a bit on the smaller side, but it had a nice selection of aerobic machines, free weights and machines. The locker rooms were top notch - perfect for early arrives and late departure flights.

title: Great food!
desc: Thanks Veejay for the awesome service and the great food recommendations! We throughly enjoyed our time here. The black truffle pizza and wagu beef lagsana is a must try! Would definitely come back again

title: Great service
desc: Our server for the night was Vijay and he was great! He was attentive and courteous throughout, and when dessert was delayed, he offered us some complimentary mini desserts from the dessert table. The ambience was also nice for a date night.

title: Will be back!
desc: Vijay was excellent in his service, and warmly welcomed us throughout. Food was on point, and absolutely yummy. This was an unforgettable experience, and the ambience was really romantic too. Perfect for a date night. Will definitely come back again!

title: Compliments for help rendered to us
desc: Hi all, Firstly, I would like to express my heart felt gratitude to the following personnel Letchu, Chris and Arjuna. There are one of the reasons making my stay together with my wife a memorial one. Long story short, my wife and I held our wedding banquet at Regent hotel and had a 3D2N stay. Staffs were friendly and room is still okay. When we were about to leave the hotel, we realised that our car was not able to start up and immediately, the three mentioned staffs took the initiative to help us out. They searched for me solutions and search for jumper cable. It was raining so they even offered to push my car to shelter from the VIP lot so repair work can be done when people come. Really felt very appreciative to them else I would have been feeling so lost. These staffs

title: June 22 visit
desc: We really enjoyed our stay, great location & staff. The doormen were really helpful and friendly & gave advice on food & places to go. The Manhattan bar and Basilico restaurant were highlights! Thanks Regent!

title: Serious Food Hotel with a Great Regent Club and staff
desc: Great 2 week stay at the Regent Singapore. They are serious about food! They have 6 venues. The Summer Palace has one Michelin star - I ate there three times - try the amazing bean curd skin roll. There's a tiny elite sushi restaurant and a great Italian restaurant that does a weekend brunch with high end shellfish and a large room only for cheeses. The wine bar is considered the best in Singapore. Best of all was the Club where the staff really cared about me. I was working very hard and long hours, and when I walked in, they just could not do enough for me - sent me back to my room with wine, macarons, food, whatever they had. Thank you Fiqar, Yvonne, and Marinah for your kindness! I'm going back for another two weeks in August.

title: Hotel Tanglin Area
desc: Great maintained hotel with history of 80-90s in Singapore. Used to be part of Four Seasons and nowadays is just part of IHG. Still their staff is exemplary for great customer service. The Manhattan Bar is once of the best in Singapore despite being rather small. Music, vibe, service and range of drinks is stunning! Unfortunately, rooms require upgrade especially curtains, carpets and bathrooms. The beds are superb. Higher floors are better!

title: Excellent service for our high tea on a weekday. Mr Ramesh explained to us well on the food, deco. Very friendly !
desc: Nice ambience , good food, server explained on the food when served and he was really friendly whenever we question on things. Even introduce us to the weekend buffet with a wider spread . Will try that one of the days. Excellent service and overall was a great experience once again.

title: One night Staycation - Jul 30, 2022 (Level 9)
desc: Checked in was smooth. Warm welcome by the front desk. The door man up to the guy that assisted us with our luggage was nice and warm too. The room was not set up with the extra bed upon entering the room. Housekeeping attendant was fast to attend to the set up request, was very polite and attentive. Hotel room was a bit small for 3 but clean even though it looks quite old, but the set up was not like normal hotel room. The TV set was at the side from the bed. So if you need to watch the TV, you need to tilt your body over, likewise for the remote control if you need to change the TV channel, you need to move your body from the bed. Curtain of the room needs to be cleaned as my son was sneezing (since his bed was near the curtain area) OR could be the aircon flew in directly

title: Lip-smacking afternoon at the Regent Hotel's Tea-Lounge
desc: First and foremost, they've got really friendly staff right from receptionist to the Tea Lounge manager, Mr Rames - their service was impeccably warm and welcoming. What can i say about the spread...yummmmy. The satay sauce was a winner with us. But the crowning glory was the prawn and porkball congee - its a flavour bomb! We went for 3rds! And then came the char-siew charred to perfection and crackling in the mouth. Apparently, its the norm for patrons to reorder this plate. And its charred just before its served... Not being a fan of beef in any form, I could not resist finishing every last morsel of roastbeef on my plate, and thats saying a lot. By now, on purpose, we were looking out for a 'blah' dish. Cant be all good, right. Ha, ha...there came the chilled cherry tomato

title: Regent Singapore
desc: Hi, i just wanted to comment you on your amazing work on keeping the hotel clean!We had such a memorable time and would definitely love to come back and visit.Although our stay was only for 1 night, we had tons of fun! Until then,take care and i hope to see you soon! Regards, Natalie (thanks for the amazing card and cake (and snacks ) )

title: Amazing brunch!
desc: Basilico brunch buffets are the bestest! The service is excellent and the desserts are wonderful! The serve staff are so attentive and professional. The cheese room is a must do and features a world of amazing cheese selection! We will definitely be back here again!

title: Still a grand hotel
desc: The Regent's current one-week stay package is a great value. We found that it included breakfast, a discount on excellent in-house restaurants (we ate twice, wish it was three times, at Summer Palace), two free pieces of laundry daily, plus a very nice, bright room (#1018) with floor to ceiling windows overlooking low buildings and green trees. The John Portman-designed atrium affords different archetectural vistas depending on where you stand and whether there's daylight or lines of golden night-time indoor lights. As our elevator ascended or descended, we especially enjoyed the patterns of the carpets and tables at Basilico Restaurant and the moving play of light on the elements of a 5 stories-tall sculpture hanging from the ceiling. The hotel staff are highly professional,

title: Birthday
desc: Excellent experience with nice high tea spread with good ambience and great service from the manager - Ramesh and his crew. Keep up the excellent customer service. In the hospitality industry, it is never wrong to do more for your customers. Plus, the 50% for the second set is definitely a big plus.

title: Family holiday
desc: Positives - comfortable beds, large bathrooms, friendly staff, impressive foyer, good breakdast at Basilico, efficient & friendly room service. Negatives - bit of a walk to the station, no ability to have a drink in the hotel in the afternoon (after a long hot walk)., did charge out credit card the wrong amount when we checked in, though this was easily corrected on Day 2.

title: A great place to celebrate birthdays!
desc: We celebrated my birthday at Basilico for the first time and it was a memorable experience. The food was top notch 👍🏼 with a vast selection of cheeses, foie gras and meats, as well as desserts. The staff were warm and went the extra mile to make us excited about the buffet.

title: Weekend staycation
desc: Stayed for a night with my family and was given two interconnecting rooms with a living room. The suite was spacious and clean. While the decor was slightly dated, this was outweighed by the cleanliness and thoughtfulness of the room set-up. The staff had kindly prepared a cake and kid-friendly amenities. Staff were friendly and went out of their way to make us comfortable. We will most certainly return! Thanks for a memorable stay.

title: Great food & service
desc: Mano and team were excellent, the service is fast & team is very approachable. The food from Summer palace is one of the best I’ve tasted in meeting, will definitely work with Regent for meetings in future. Thank you once again to Mano and team.

title: Lovely hotel
desc: Our family of 5 recently had the pleasure of staying at the Regent. The foyer is very grand and the staff were friendly and welcoming. We had a Club room which comprised 2 bedrooms and a sitting room in between. It was a spacious suite with lots of room and a balcony. We enjoyed the expansive breakfast buffet and dined for dinner at Basilico one evening. There are several restaurants in the hotel and the Manhatten bar. The hotel is well located for Orchard Rd shopping and is an easy 10 minute walk to ION orchard and the MRT. The only negatives I mention are for families with young children. As noted in another review, children under the age of 12 are not allowed in the Club Lounge during the 5:30-7:30 evening drinks. We weren’t aware of this and 2 of our 3 children couldn’t

title: Best Hi-Tea
desc: My friends n I enjoyed our afternoon Hi-Tea buffet at Regent Singapore’s Tea Lounge . We had the most fabulous afternoon celebrating our birthdays. Service provided by restaurant manager, Ramesh n his team were impeccable. They were so attentive n friendly to all the guests needs . Selection of food for the afternoon tea were very good n delicious with local delights n the usual Scones n tea sandwiches. Every single dish was delicious! We will certainly return again ! Thank you , Ramesh n team !

title: Exceptional service and comfort.
desc: Our family of 3 has recently really enjoyed our stay at The Regency Singapore. This was our first international holiday escape since the beginning of the pandemic, we were super excited. Our booking was booked through Luxury Escapes as a package, we were in a club suite. I have positives and negatives to point out, I would definitely like to start with the positives. Positives - Cleanliness of the entire hotel cannot be faulted Room cleaning is perfect and all ammenities were refreshed daily even towels (which we did not expect) Staff were so friendly, remembered our names and greeted us personally The club lounge staff were ultra helpful and cared for us so kindly. I would like to give a special shoutout to Faith from the Regency Club who went above and

title: best cocktail bar in the town!
desc: Always feel warm welcome with amazing cocktails!! Especially Yahan who guide me thru the new menu of 2022, and give you constituently professional cocktails guidebook !! Definitely a good place to explore and enjoy the best time with friends !

title: We had a lovely dinner at Basilico.
desc: The Truffle foccacia was simply awesome.😍Compliments to FMB Mgr Mr Tiness and Mr Vijay who made our evening a well spent evening. Also your Banquet Ops Mgr Mr Murugan who gave us a brief of Regent Hitel. They all made Regent hotel proud👏👏👏 From : Mr. Arul email arul_manunited@yahoo.com

title: Wonderful High Tea and Gluten Free!
desc: We had a wonderful high tea with family here, and perfect Gluten Free options available. Lovely area to sit in and enjoy the afternoon. Special mention for the attentive and kind staff :) will definitely come back!

title: Excellent food worth coming back for!
desc: Excellent service and food (well recommended by Julia). Amazing staff with great attention to detail. Came here for our anniversary and the staff was attentive to note based on our conversation without us informing beforehand. We were pleasantly surprised with a cake. Props to Julia and her team! 🎉🎉🎉

title: Great night out, incredibly great service
desc: I have been to many establishments at the Regent and they have been great. Great food, great ambience. But Basilico has been truly outstanding and a class of its own. Tonight I was there to celebrate my aunt's birthday and they have gone out of the way to impress. The dazzling array of high quality Italian produce at the appetizer and cheese bars, high quality desserts, superb mains and great quality (albeit bit pricey) wines, we were not left for wanting. I would have had more pictures if we werent so eager to dig in. But what really blew us away was the great service! From the moment I arrived (late), I was greeted with such poise and warmth. The manager was so kind to waive a bottle's corkage to allow us to toast my aunt to bubbly and even accorded us a round birthday cake

title: Great city stay
desc: Absolutely loved our stay here. Everything was perfect, staff friendly, amenities always available and food was great. We were surprised how nice the pool was considering it isn’t publicised much. We had club lounge access, definitely worth the extra for the afternoon tea and evening drinks. Stay here if In Singapore

title: Great for families with young children
desc: It was a long ago voucher we bought during the covid period and after 2 years the feeling was amazing. We were upgraded to the suite with tent and my daughter (she usually feels bored being the only child). But she was much engaged by the tent with comfy mattress as well as mixing her milkshake with condiments! I can enjoy my favourite tea with the in room tea selections. Staff there I encounter are all friendly as well! Walking distance to the botanic garden and orchard for a stroll after eating. Nearby the Tanglin mall has some nice shops as well. Food in the hotels are nice. Highly recommend the summer palace and the bascilico. Although there are some years to the hotel, it’s clean and well maintained. The only downside is that my daughter kept telling me to bring her

title: Awesome stay!
desc: Friendly and courteous hotel staffs that assist us in the check in. Decent room size and came with bathtub. Received a surprise birthday arrangement for my Fiancé from Rooms Operations Executive Louis. Thank you very much for creating a memorable stay for us!

title: High tea session
desc: Always happy to be back .. excellent service as usual despite a few temporary staffs…. still like the original classic spread than the current seasonal spread , glad some of the classics dishes are still being served.

title: WEEKEND HIGH TEA
desc: Weekend Tea Lounge Great food , wonderful service. Cosy seating Ramesh / Chef and team whip up a great gastronomic experience couple with attentive service. Had a Great time with the family. Thank you !!!

title: Charming Hotel with Well-Mannered, Discrete Staff (Near To Botanic Gardens)
desc: Perfect for those who are seeking a high quality, charming hotel with centrally launched bullet lifts with close proximity to Botanic Gardens,. The pool could be bigger, lounge wider but when the sun sets after a long day, it is the service that defines the day well-spent. Top 3 Loves - Monogram tea selection. Lounge staffers Yvonne and Figar packed a bag of Monogram tea for each of us and advised on layering. Sunday brunch at Manhattan Bar. Must-go. Sturdy and comfortable bed

title:
Regent Hotel Restaurant Sunday Tea
1 Cuscaden Road, Singapore
desc: Fabulous experience celebrating a birthday with friends while enjoying outstanding food and variety of teas. The desserts were not only beautifully presented but also delicious. Everyone raved over the pork belly brought to the table. The service staff were attentive and so friendly. Thanks to the following for making our dining celebration a delightful afternoon: Minoh, Cristal, Kert, Alice, Ramesh and Chef Chong The Black family South Carolina, USA

title: Pet Getaway
desc: Had a relex n enjoyable staycation with my mother and our furkid. Hotel front staff and room service are friendly and helpful. In room dining food we ordered taste yummy! Thank you for the goodies for paw guest.

title: Quick Getaway
desc: My husband and I recently stayed at the Regent, a belated celebration of our 27th anniversary. Normally travelling somewhere in January we had to wait until travel restrictions lifted. Singapore our favourite Asian destination but our first time at the Regent. The hotel was clean and room a good size. Bed a little firm for our liking but room was always serviced well each day. We had a lovely cake and note on our arrival to acknowledge our anniversary. Breakfast daily in Basillico was great. Excellent selection of food on offer and service great. Our time in the club lounge was met with friendly staff, happy to stop and have a chat and offering help in finding things to do in Singapore. A special shout out to Marinah, Figar Yvonne and Jovis. Your service was exceptional. Food

title: Best banquet manager Mano. Will come back again.
desc: Honestly the best banquet manager I have ever worked with. We did an event in regent and he ensures everything is well taken care of. The food flows smoothly and he acceded to my many many requests and make it happen instantly for me. Working with him is such a breeze. One thing that strikes me is his willingness to go the extra mile and he genuinely cares for people. When I had gastric pain/ reflux he recommended mee the drug to take and even took a screenshot for me. Treated me like family. Thank you Mano! You make my event run slightly and I hope we will get to work together more in future.:)

title: Lovely hotel with fantastic service.
desc: Really enjoyed our 4 nights here. Staff were super friendly and very helpful. We got to use the Regent Club as part of our stay which was a nice bonus. Facilities were great. Very clean. Breakfast was a diverse selection. Will be back.

title: Great stay and fantastic rooms with friendly staff.
desc: Mixed feelings. Hotel hard product - amazing. Rooms spacious and comfortable. A little dated but I like a classic feel hotel. It was wonderful rooms with beds beautiful setup for our large family and really nice. Service - all the hotel staff worked excellently and efficiently always pleasant with a smile. Brought a birthday cake for my sons birthday, very nice! Would have given 6 stars in my mind. This means allowed somethings to slide but still hit 5 star here But lost 2 stars because the G.M was missing in action and the management in charge not sufficiently empowered. Wrote to G.M Oscar Postma more than once during our four night stay. Never got a single reply from him during or after our stay. Considering we have top status, no courtesy reply at all. Instead one of

title: Superb Service & very good buffet!
desc: Super happy with the service by Vijay & colleague Justin! Very proactive & bubbly service made my experience dining here so much more enjoyable. Service staff like Vijay definitely deserve to be recognised. The buffet spread had a lot of variety and the quality of food is really worth a visit!

title: Pleasantly surprised
desc: We visit Singapore 2 to 3 times per year and normally stay in the marina downtown area, but this time we chose to stay in the upper Orchard area and are so glad we did, as our experience on the Exec floor of he Regent was extremely good. The hotel's location proved to be better than CBD business district of downtown Singapore, as we were within walking distance of shops, restaurants, MRT, friends that live in the area and clubs, like Tanglin and American. Aside from that, to me - "new" Regent was very well decorated/appointed. We used all the facilities from Basilico restaurant and Manhattan Bar, to the gym and pool, all were very good. Yes the Regent ticked all the boxes for us. Then of course there was the Exec lounge as well, which was an added bonus. It was well managed

title: Fantastic
desc: Regent hotel is a graceful and elegant hotel with excellent food venue. Club level rooms are specious and well appointed. Located within an easy walk to Orchard Road shopping precinct. Staff at the hotel made our stay even more enjoyable. All extremely helpful and eager to help. In particular, Marinah in the club lounge who always had a smiling face and went beyond the call of duty to help out and give suggestions of places to visit and restaurants to dine at.

title: birthday celebration
desc: hi ,im regent Tea lounge regular customer.because of covid i never visit for 2 yrs.everytime we celebrate birthday here.we enjoy the food n friendly staff here.we r here almost 10 yrs.i always take. tea lounge as my first choir. after covid this is the first time we celebrate birthday at tea lounge. im so disappointed alot of things missing n yr famous prawn scallop porridge i love.... not as good as last time.cant even see the prawn n scallop only alot of meat ball n other not match.the prawn r so small ps n not fresh.everytime my family member say good...but today nobody say good .the first round i aready nothing to eat.the beef standard is same good. i told yr staff Alice n chef chong the menu has change some r missing.no attractive. tea lounge staff ...Alice, Mel ,chef chong

title: Basilico weekend lunch buffet review
desc: Went there for buffet lunch. Food there is excellent, with a large variety to choose from. Service by Vijay and Justin is impeccable. The ambiance and decor is perfect as well. Had an enjoyable time overall.

title: Regent singapore- first class service
desc: We stayed at the Regent for 7 days to take a break from our busy lives in Melbourne. It was a perfect get away. The hotel itself is comfortable and well located near Orchard road. What gives this place its charm is the service. We had nightly drinks at the Regent Club. Each day we were welcomed by Yvonne our host who could not do more to make us welcome, from ensuring our wine glass was never empty to organising a late check out. We have both visited Singapore many times and really found this older style beauty a great place to wind down and recharge. Thank you to everyone from the lovely gentleman on room service to the concierge who coordinated our many taxis, to Yvonne and co at the regent club for their exemplary service- you all made this a delightful stay.

title: Excellent Service in the Manhattan Bar!
desc: Visited the Manhattan Bar on a Tuesday Evening and I have to say, the service really speaks volume here. From the moment we entered the bar to us leaving, we were greeted with such hospitality from the hostesses to even the bartenders. Especially Tei, who served us the drinks and making us feel so welcomed here. They even gave me and my friends a welcome cocktail, the 3000! No doubt the best cocktail I ever had! Will definitely come back with my family and friends!!!

title: Basilico Restaurant
desc: Had my lunch meal with hubby just now, the foods are very nice with very worth price!! The service is wonderful, the staff will attend to you whenever you need them!! I will definitely come again with my friends and family

title: Great food great ambience
desc: Just discovered the restaurant this year and already made a few visits. Becoming our favourite with good quality, non oily and best service, yet not too stiff environment. Another plus point is having a Sommelier around for those wine lovers who enjoy their food with good wine.

title: Great dinner at basilico
desc: Had a lovely time at basilico and great service. Anandhan spent time explaining the buffet selection and was very patient with our requests. Will definitely be back here again! I specially for the cheese selection where they had 50 selections of cheese!

title: Lovely lunch with a nice ambience for catch up
desc: Love the Salad n cheese spread and dips. Dessert station too. The mains pasta was superb. Thank you to the service staff and Ananthan for good service. Would be nice to have just plain tea or black coffee with milk on side as part of buffet.

title: Mr
desc: Warm, attentive and attention to details. Special shout out to Yvonne at the regent club lounge who is absolutely fantastic. Thank you regent Singapore! It was a fantastic stay and we will definitely be back again!

title: Excellent food
desc: Highly recommend the pumpkin soup; you may consider dropping 1 or 2 dishes and having 1 soup per pax. Service is great, we were recommended some dishes which turned out to be delicious too. Will definitely return here again.

title: Buffet Dinner
desc: Buffet spread was decent. Wide variety of cheeses! Angus beef and lasagne were good. Desserts were not overly sweet. Unfortunately, the prawns were not too fresh. Kudos to Nanathan and the team for the impeccable service!

title: Wonderful lunch at Summer Palace
desc: Many things I was impressed with this place such that it was not just a meal, it was a learning experience. 1) food was undoubtedly great! Tasty and looking pretty and beautifully presented. 2) the service of ALL the staff are great! Not just one or two persons but all of them! From rearranging existing arrangements to slot us in without reservations to helping us with sitting for the baby, food recommendations, food presentation and keeping an eye for our impromptu needs, all top notch. It felt so pleasant that it made me want to be a better person and give great service myself. Maybe when my son is older I will bring him there to learn and experience this someday. 3) the place is beautiful. Happily took a lot of photos. My wife was satisfied haha! A good place to bring

title: Dinner
desc: Fabulous food .. great service. Mr Prem was excellent in his service Thank you. Great ambience and overall staff was cool and friendly and ready for small chat. rare for buffet to have such standard of service. There’s a cheese room!

title: Great stay with Club Lounge access!
desc: I finally got to enjoy the Long Foodie Staycation booked back in year 2020 which included upgrade to Regent Club Room and lounge access. The team in the Regent Club lounge - Fiqar, Yvonne, Jovis really made our stay a special one! Fiqar knew we were celebrating our anniversary and went the extra mile to prepare surprises for us when we visited the Lounge. The food and drinks served at the Club lounge were of good quality though it was a small spread. Jovis was attentive and Yvonne made excellent cocktails. We had a relaxed and enjoyable staycation with smiley faces and commendable services from this hotel.

title: Excellent Service and Stay
desc: We came for a staycay with our baby and had an excellent time. The service was excellent and the room was spacious - plenty of room even after placing a cot. Plenty of food options in and around the hotel, and nearbyTanglin Mall has a mix of shops that's different from what you would get along Orchard Road.

title:
Awesome High tea @tea lounge park-90
Regent Singapore (Highly recommended)
desc: We had a wonderful birthday High tea at this place.Very cozy,nice place,very friendly staffs and nice food.Special thanks to Anba for making this celebration even more pleasant.Highly recommended and the food is really up to standard 👍👍👍👍👍👍👍👍👍👍
