title: Outstanding service
desc: The service at The Regent was excellent especially in the club. Thanks to Fiqar who went above and beyond and Marinah and Yvonne. The room was comfortable and spacious with excellent water pressure in the shower. Felt like a grand lady of Singapore

title: Services rendered
desc: Celebrated my birthday with a group of girlfriends & was most impressed by services rendered by Justin in Basilico. He’s attentive to details & affable. Most surprising to find out he’s just a trainer. Definitely highly recommended him for a great lunch experience in the restaurant 👍🏼👍🏼👍🏼

title: Dated rooms but Regent Club shines
desc: Room – I received an upgrade to the Premium Room (38SqM), Room 620. The main space itself is spacious enough to fit a king bed (super comfy and firm) with 2x bedside tables equipped with powerpoints, a sitting area + coffee table , a work desk + chair, and a TV + console which offers more cupboard space. The sitting area + coffee table feels aged due to the choice of colors here, but this is also where the property set up some cute birthday deco (balloons!). A welcome fruit platter + welcome note was set up on the coffee table, along with 4 sets of plates/cutlery. Bathroom - Drapped in brown marbles, the space contains a single sink with sufficient countertop space, a toilet right in the middle, and a shower-tub with the dreaded shower curtain (I mean, how often do they clean

title: Exceptional 5-Star Top Tier Accommodations. Highly recommend!
desc: Their accommodations and staff were 5-star top tier exceptional. The staff - Housekeeping (Cindy), Bell desk (Hari), Hotel Mgr. (Jeevan), were outstanding, offering VIP treatment helping to make our stay memorable. I highly recommend

title: Wonderful service at the Regent Singapore!
desc: My wife and I had the pleasure of a 7 night stay at the Regent Singapore. The facilities were of a very high quality and our treatment by all staff was even better. There was a great variety of high quality food at the Bacilico, with daily menu changes ensuring pleasant surprises every day. The proximity of a bus stop just outside of the Regent provides a very convenient entry into the efficient Singapore transportation system. We will be definitely returning.

title: Exceptional Service, Amazing Breakfast Buffet
desc: Stayed here with friends for Singapore Grand Prix weekend and the service was so excellent! One of the Managers, Jeevan, greeted us and found out in conversation that we didn't have tickets for the big day, Sunday... within minutes he had made the ticket arrangements for us! Staff in general in all areas that I encountered - check-in, dining & room cleaning - were friendly, quick to smile and helpful. The breakfast buffet was amazing, lots of options and variety, both local/regional and English/American-style. Definitely will choose to stay here when next I visit.

title: Lousy and worst service
desc: Had a comfortable stay , Great Amenities , just the quality of service is definitely the lowest ! Staff from the lounge were super friendly and helpful . Unfortunately the experience in summer palace , Mandy was worst of all , having to walk up to her to ask for providing orders with the broken language she spoke and could not understand the words I’m Talking about . She doesn’t even understand the brew tea purposes which really disappoints me one Michelins without the knowledge on how to serve a premium tea . She got annoyed when I asked several questions and I can even hear her using vulgarity on me at my back , which I’m definitely not deaf ! Going back to London with this experience definitely disappointing

title: Afternoon tea
desc: Great services, great atmosphere, great tea selections. I went there on a regular Tuesday’s afternoon, it was quite relaxed because it was not overcrowded. I enjoy the space and privacy of the environment. I like the deco and lighting as well. I’m impressed of the service offered from one of the servers “Alice”, who was so attentive and inviting. She introduced different types of tea offered in their cafe. It was a wonderful experience I love to come back.

title: Splendid meal at Summer Palace; must try their Michelin menu
desc: Came in with partner on a September Saturday evening. Was served by Mandy and she gave very good recommendations on what to eat for the two of us. She was very friendly and checked in on us regularly throughout the meal. We were very satisfied with the meal and would like to compliment Mandy and all staff for the evening. Highly recommended!

title: Wedding at Regent
desc: Banquet manager, Jeremy and his team were the most supportive in the planning of our big day. Throughout the 9 months of planning, we were assisted in every reasonable request and even some really last minute ones. My wife and I are really thankful for the hotels help. Post Wedding, we really enjoyed the wedding suite, it gave us a much needed palace-like room to recover. Regent has retained much of its rustic elegance. Compared to many of the newer hotels with smart TVs, automated toilets and bedside light control, Regent's focused on what it is and instead of trying to be what it is not. Breakfast at Basilico was amazing, with a large range of local and international food. Live egg station was the highlight for me. Cocktails at the famous Manhatten bar did not disappoint

title: Great stay at club room
desc: Stayed at the club lounge rooms and they were excellent. Big and spacious and good service at the club lounge as well. Only thing for improvement was the soundproofing, on the 11th floor but could still hear traffic at times. But apart from that no issues.

title: Cosy place for dinner
desc: Good food! The Chianti which Captain Ananthan recommended went superbly well with the Angus beef. Thank you Captain, for the very attentive service 😊 We wrapped up the night with the must-try tiramisu!

title: Excellent service at Basilico
desc: Wide Variety of cheese , good introduction of cheese by chef ; seafood selection was fresh . In addition , the service staff , Ananthan, was meticulous and polite. Overall, a good experience 👍 Mr Yap & Family

title: The best italian food ever
desc: Mi arrendo at the amount of good food that i had. A particular thanks to Chef Valerio and the super efficent Ananda from the floor . I will definitely come back on my next visit to Singapore. Thank you guys.

title: Tea House Buffet High Tea
desc: The Quarterly Theme Lunch High Tea was, as always, wonderful. The food was well prepared in a fabulous spread of local dishes that brings a lovely satisfaction to the meal. The Signature Congee is a must try among their other dishes. Each table also serves an amazing charsiew that was so incredible, everyone from young to old wanted second helpings. As i was travelling with two three-year-olds, food choices are always a concern. while they definitely enjoyed all the sandwiches, bread and desserts, they were even happier with the pasta that was prepared for them by the head chef Chong. we had wanted to order something ala carte for the kids as the buffet was catered towards adults. Chef Chong however, offered to whip up a more kid-friendly pasta instead. Their commitment to

title: Truly disappointing stay at Regent Hotel
desc: We arrived at 2:30 pm after a difficult time at immigration in which my girlfriend was unduly detained for 45 minutes for no apparent reason except discrimination against Thai female with American male companion. As an Ambassador member, we were disappointed not to be recognized as having top status and were denied club access which they claimed was only available to Royal Ambassadors. We allegedly were upgraded to a better room on 6th with a view of construction. The room did not have adequate space for 2 large suitcases and we placed them on the floor. The room was dated in appearance with no outlets for iPhone or iPad and we used adapters which we brought with us. The bathroom had an old fashioned toilet, a single sink and a combination shower/tub. There were 2 large and 2

title: Nice hotel but construction noise is terrible
desc: Nice old school Singapore hotel but the major construction going on behind it is very loud and goes late into the early evening so forget about relaxing in your room during construction hours. Also given the shortage of taxis in Singapore at present it’s a 15 walk to nearest MRT which is just that bit far.

title: Great dining experience
desc: Very nice experience. Great ambiance, excellent spread of cold cuts and main dishes. The beef and lamb were very nice. Fabulous spread of cheese, with a lot of choice (50 different kinds !!). Great choice of Italian wines.

title: Fancy restaurant with delicious dishes
desc: overall resturant vibe and service made it a different experience. espicially Julia who served us very well and was very helpful with selecting dishes for us. food portions were plentiful and brilliant setting. placed in a 5 star hotel.

title: Fine dining at Summer Palace, Regent Hotel Singapore.
desc: Excellent food, presentation and service. Nice ambience in private room with astonishing good view. Very prompt and attentive service by Mandy who met our every requests and needs. Would recommend to anyone we know to dine here. In summary, excellent food, service and ambience. Will be back.

title: Fine Food and Gold Service at Summer Palace
desc: We always have very enjoyable and delightful dining experience at Summer Palace. The food are excellent and the very nice and courteous service of all the staff like Mark, Moo, Sophia, Mandy & Shu Mei make every visit a pleasant one. Special commends to Shu Mei & Mandy who often serve us, are always so attentive, friendly and efficient. We highly recommend the restaurant, always with excellent fine food & gold service!

title: A memorable stay in a great hotel
desc: Our daughter chose the Regent Hotel for our stay having previously experienced the service and care: we were not disappointed. I've stayed at many hotels in Singapore over the years since 1980 and this would be the best in terms of genuine friendliness and service. Nothing it seemed was too much trouble for the staff and that extended beyond the Regent Club staff. From advice about travel and local food in Singapore to simply remembering a breakfast order the complete experience was exceptional. My wife, gluten-intolerant, was noticed avoiding eating in the Club and once the reason was known the staff ensured she received gluten-free dishes. After the last few trips to Singapore some years back I was in no hurry to return and take my chances with supercilious staff in

title: Fantastic food and service at Basilico restaurant
desc: Ate dinner at Basilico restaurant and came away very satisfied. The quality of the food is still fantastic, each dish was done well, no misses, all hits! The staff was prompt, polite and very helpful. We had an extremely pleasant experience.

title: Classic Hotel
desc: We stayed at the Regent for three nights with Club Room access. The hotel is located at the northern end of the city, close to the Botanic Gardens and with bus transport to most areas just outside the front door. We found the Regent to be one of those classic Singapore hotels (old worldly in a way) with customer service that we could not fault. Really appreciated the advice and help we got from staff on the front desk and in the Club Room. Our room was reasonably large, comfortable and clean. My wife found the bed somewhat high (but then she is short!) but it was certainly comfortable. Two little things that we marked it down on were the Basilico Restaurant which although providing a very good buffet dinner was not the a la carte we were expecting, and the fact that rooms are

title: Older charming luxury hotel
desc: It’s an older hotel that’s about to be rebranded as a Conrad. Rooms are spacious but dated (as is the rest of the hotel) Pool facilities need to be upgraded. Breakfast was tasty and the service in the restaurant was attentive. Location is just at the end of orchard road and there are several bus tops nearby. Although it’s not the most convenient if you want to explore downtown SG

title: Lunch at Summer Palace, Regent Hotel
desc: Always a wonderful lunch at Summer Palace. Set Menus are the best choice, especially the Chef Liu’s Tasting Menu. Always great service from all staff. Furniture and carpet needs a new change / refresh.

title: The Regent hotel is fantastic!
desc: This is the place. Superb service in all aspects of my trip. Kind and courteous staff from the front door, registration desk to housekeeping and wait staff. Convenient location near Orchard. Room was large and comfortable with all of the necessities provided.

title: Fantastic old school charm combined with service excellence !!
desc: The property is charming and luxurious in design that truly inspires. It is clearly a well deserving 5 star hotel off Orchard Road in Singapore. The experience right from check in till our last day was impeccable. Staff were always polite and professional. Will be sad to see this hotel be rebranded soon next year as I have many great memories of this hotel right from when it was a four seasons managed hotel till now with IHG. The room must have been the cleanest I have ever seen anywhere in the world I have travelled and better than many other luxurious 5 star properties. Good job team and thank you for making my stay really worthwhile.

title: Best hotel in the Tanglin area - classy as always
desc: First visited this hotel in 2008 and it remains excellent. Whole place exudes a sense of calm. Rooms are large, with very comfortable beds and modern (but classy) fittings. Breakfast is excellent. Staff are so helpful. Nice pool as well. Great location for Botanic Gardens and western end of Orchard Road. Not close to MRT, but that will change in late 2022 when Orchard Boulevard opens, and plenty of bus options. A top hotel, and definitely the best option by Tanglin Mall. (It is a league above the neighbouring Jen Tanglin)

title: Simon chua.
desc: Food is nice,service was great.espically ramesh n his team.will definitely go back dinning again.😀 the food was very very very delicious and would like to vist agn , roasted beef ,laksa,chilli crab were all amazing

title: Best Service Ever & my Face go to italian resto
desc: Superb Authentic Italian Buffet line at Basilico and always keep on coming back here coz i also love the service. Shout out to Service Attendant Vijay, Chef Levis and the cutie hostess korean Anna they are all so nice and friendly plus very helpful! Thanks again for the cake u made for my bro in law "goede reis" thanks again to Basilico!

title: Excellent service
desc: Great service. Spend is small but food is of a good quality. The baked salmon, laksa, chicken satay and seafood porridge was delicious. Service by Alice was friendly and efficient. The tea lounge area is cleaned throughly and vacuumed after the first steating. Excellent cos not many restaurants do a through cleaning in between the two seatings.

title: Disappointing experience
desc: Month of Stay: Oct 2022 Status: IHG Platinum Elite Room: Premium The check-in process was smooth but robotic. The check-in counter staff did not seem too interested in engaging in pleasantries while we waited for our room keys. There was no mention of my loyalty to the IHG brand. Not even a mere “thank you for being a loyal customer”, which was quite disappointing. Forget about any amenities or privileges even if you’re a platinum member. I actually had better service at a Holiday Inn Express (another IHG hotel) in Dublin a few weeks before. The room was mediocre. Nothing to shout about. In fact, the bathroom was dated. The shower head in the bathroom looked like it was never changed in 20 years or so. That said, the bed was comfortable. There was a “high definition” TV

title: Feeling at home in Basilico
desc: So glad to be back at here, one of my fave restaurants. Love the spread, from salads & appetisers to the hit food and dessert. The buffet’s always good but top that with warm service, and it’s a perfect afternoon!!! Thank you Chef and Malcolm, we had a wonderful time!

title: Regent Singapore, so much more!
desc: Jeevan Prakash, Harry, Cindy and the Regent Singapore hotel are amazing. They say “It’s not where you are, but who you’re with” and this is both. Check in and the rooms were well prepared and comfortable. Breakfast at Bacilico had vast choices and was on point every morning. Rooms service was surprisingly gourmet level. Housekeeping went above & beyond repeatedly with a smile and no ask was too much. When the “wow” for your eyes is less important Singapore delivers the “ahhh” for your soul. Highly recommended!

title: Great food matched by exceptional service
desc: Had a great dining experience at Summer Palace restaurant. The food was great as expected, as they clearly used ingredients that were super fresh and of premium quality. The high quality of food was also matched by the service from the staff, who we found to be attentive and knowledgeable. Special thanks to Harold for his service! If you’re looking for traditional, high quality Chinese food, Summer Palace is the place to go.

title: Yummy high tea
desc: Absolutely enjoyed the high tea at the tea lounge. Great and sumptuous spread at the buffet table. Try the char siew that is made to order. The friendliest and very personable experience with lovely staff.

title: Comfortable room and delicious food at restaurant Basilico
desc: Room was spacious with a nice seating area. Many electrical points were available in the room as well. Only downside was that the tv was not movable and faced the seating area and not the bed. We opted for the buffet lunch at restaurant Basilico. Lots of variety with delicious appetisers, mains and dessert. Service was great as well. Only downside was that beverages are not part of the buffet options and are heavily priced.

title: Great high tea at Tealounge
desc: #Hightea #Afternoontea #Tealounge I hardly write any reviews but the experience at the regent has changed my mind. :) I enjoy afternoon tea so much I occasionally book one to spoil myself. I’ve been to quite a few different hotels and cafes thou, Regent is definitely one of my favourites!!! They provides a great selection of tea, ohh, try their house blends if you are indecisive as me. It was soooooo good. They have nice ambience and the seats are comfortable, the distance between tables are good enough to keep some privacy. Of course, their three-tiered savouries and sweets were great too. Their tea time is 3 hrs from 2-5 pm while other places are 1.5 hrs -2 hrs, which gives you enough time to enjoy the petite sweets until the last bite. However, what made my day so special

title: Business Trip
desc: Drop by for appreciation for hotel's staff hospitality. Was here 3 days for business trips. The hotel itself is quite dated and my room was a bit dusty given im v sensitive to dustmites i had runny nose all night. The next day came a heartwarming tea sets with lemon honey wishing me well. Room also is neatly rearranged to be extra clean. All of my wishes are well taken care of, Thank You for your camaraderie ❤️💕✨️💫

title: Stay here for Super Foodie Staycation and the Regent Club!
desc: Stayed there under the Super Foodie Staycation over the recent Christmas weekend. This was a stay package that I bought in 2020 during the pandemic. While my previous stay in October was less ideal but with great service recovery, this stay really addressed many issues and made it really memorable. We were given many treats, such as christmas chocolates, goodies and personalised cards from the various teams; the concierge, guest experience and the Club Lounge Team. Room wise, while I was a little bummed that it was the same room again (1005), they took the feedback seriously and made adjustment to make the stay better. Other than that, I think the Regent Club team was what it made the stay from good to impeccable. We were treated with Afternoon tea and Evening Cocktails for

title: Very nice hotel, but rooms are very dated
desc: Excellent location and very warm service by the staff, but the software is somewhat let down by the hardware with the guest room (at least the one assigned to me) being very dated. The fittings (e.g. bathroom) are designs from the '80s and '90s. Guestroom modernization will bring some alignment to price charged.

title: Amazing Hotel
desc: Beautiful hotel, great service, and a short walk to orchard shopping mall. My only minor issue is that I have diamond status with IHG but was not offered an upgraded room. But no biggie. If you plan on visiting the Marina Bay often I would recommends finding a hotel a little closer.

title: Excellent service
desc: Service was terrific. Breakfast was generally quite good, with a variety of items. The front desk manager (Shamin) was wonderful and very professional. Housekeeping service was prompt and beds were from and comfortable. Water pressure was great and water was hot. Rooms were quiet. A very pleasant stay.

title: The Best Buffet in Singapore
desc: Always enjoy the buffet at Basilico. Although the variety may be limited to western food, all dishes are excellent and with great quality. Staff is also friendly and attentive to customers' needs. The decoration and atmosphere is nice. This is the place where you want to recommend to friends and colleagues. Definitely will visit again soon.

title: The one and only place for holiday brunch
desc: One of our favorite hotels and definitely our favorite place for weekend brunch in the whole of Singapore. We fully indulged not just the food and drinks and also the space and service. We made the private room our own dining room for one afternoon. A perfect opening into the Christmas season. ❤️

title: Wedding lunch for Andy and Hui Ting
desc: Mr Mano (banquet manager) had exceeded and coordinate a wonderful banquet for my bro on 27th Nov afternoon. His outstanding knowledge and experience had orchestra a unforgettable memorable wedding for the newly weds ! Kudos !

title: It's the service that lets it down....
desc: A long wait for check-in (only one employee on duty) after a long flight wasn't a great start. As an IHG Diamond Elite member I asked if an upgrade was available, but was told that there weren't any rooms available at the next level up. I went upstairs and looked on-line - there were rooms available for the duration of my stay at the next level up - I don't appreciate being lied to. The vast open space at the heart of the hotel is a great feature, but there was an amplified event taking place until late on the night of my arrival, meaning I couldn't get to sleep. At breakfast the next morning I was told that I would be charged for breakfast - I advised the employee that I had chosen free breakfast as my Welcome Amenity but, after some tapping, she insisted that I still had

title: Excellent service and wonderful dining experience at Basilico
desc: Had a good time at Basilico. Excellent service from the staff, and the food was excellent. Had a bit of misunderstanding about the promotions, but the service staff handled the issue well and respectfully. We ordered the appetizer platter, seafood stew, beef lasagna, and tiramisu. Portions were reasonable and everything was really good. Highly recommended, and do remember to make reservations!

title: Delicious! Friendly staff.
desc: Amazing food! We got pizza with buratta for starter and carbonara for mains brought by the chef himselt. We absolutely loved it. The ambience was great and staff just went above and beyond. Would highly recommend.

title: Great dining experience
desc: This is my second time here. Came for the Michelin tasting menu and now the Chef Lou’s dinner tasting menu. Both menus are exquisite and food is really good! Great place for celebration too. Will bring my friends and family here again. Service is also excellent.

title: Amazing Italian food
desc: I had dinner with my friends at Basilico at Regents Hotel in Singapore and it was one of the most amazing nights! Love it there! Especially the pizzas we ordered were top-notch! Definitely coming back here:)

title: Regent Hotel Tea Lounge
desc: We totally enjoyed our time at the Tea Lounge afternoon tea. The festive decoration was beautiful, ambience was serene and calm. Perfect for enjoying tea with scones, sandwiches and desserts. The service was excellent especially Alice. Alice was very friendly and helpful. She was very knowledgable in recommending the tea selections. I would definitely come back again for the afternoon tea.

title: Friendly and worth
desc: That is the reason why Summer palace be Michelin restaurant 1) Friendly and kindly staff, very thanks for service 2) Delicious food and materials are fresh Special thanks to Jack Sophia Sau May Allen Mandy

title: Service Par Excellence
desc: I felt compelled to write about my stay at The Regent Singapore because of my overwhelmingly positive experience with the hotel. The entire staff was always cheerful and helpful, from the moment of contact with the bellman/porter and check-in to final check-out. The Regent was able to give me a late check-out to accommodate my late flight schedule. The breakfast in the Basilico was excellent with an amazing variety of choices to suit any palate and the attentive Dolcetto staff was available to conjure up delightful delicacies to the accompaniment of wine post-breakfast. One bellwether I use to judge an establishment overall is the tidiness of its restrooms. The Regent facilities were always clean and well-stocked. Although The Regent is ideally located near the Botanic

title: Awesome Service by Nathan
desc: I attended a wedding lunch yesterday at the ballroom and was very impressed with the service rendered by one of the banquet executives, Nathan! He took good care of our table and offered me a shawl as I was feeling cold. Thank you Nathan, you are a gem!

title: Great service. Wonderful meal
desc: We had a wonderful time celebrating my wife’s birthday. Staff member Ananthan was very hospitable and polite. We enjoyed our experience tremendously. The food was delicious. The lobsters were fresh and the grilled beef was tender and not over cooked

title: Great !
desc: The staff is very welcoming and friendly. They have great service. The food here is excellent and does not disappoint. Cheese room is amazing. 100% grantee food coma. Definitely will come back again

title: Birthday celebration at Summer Palace
desc: We had an enjoyable birthday celebration for my mom’s 70th at Regent’s Summer Palace. A big shout out to the team at the restaurant, “Shu Mei” for her cheerful service! My parents enjoyed the Chef’s tasting menu, especially the Superior chicken soup which is packed with lotsa collagen and goodness!!

title: Family birthday celebration and children’s finishing of psle and o levels; been 3 ura. Vijay was friendly and amazing !
desc: It has been 3 years since the family visited. Kids have been anticipating it for a while and had just finished o levels and psle. Vijay was there with a smile and friendliness that put the kids at ease instantly. Ever helpful and never pushy, my kids loved that they could relax and be themselves. The antipasti didn’t disappoint. I liked the prosciutto and arugula. And the cheese table is back! I couldn’t tell you my favorite as I tried too many medium and soft cheeses with figs.

title: Conrad Wedding
desc: Conrad’s food, service and ambience was remarkable. We had live stations from Basilico, summer palace and Manhattan bar and they truly lived up to their reputations - our family and friends thoroughly enjoyed the dining experience! A big shoutout to the account manager and banquet coordinator who guided us before and during the wedding. We were stress free on the wedding day and were able to enjoy the night without many hiccups

title: Wonderful staycation, hope the spirit of Regent lives on
desc: Service was excellent- friendly, attentive, warm and go out of their way to make our stay memorable. Want to recognise in particular Phoo at front desk, Gerald at communication and Nadi at Dolcetto. Excellent attitude and service at their hearts - such staff are a real asset, please look after them. Though the premise was old, maintenance was very good. Room are still comfortable and clean. Bed was very comfortable. Very sad to see the Regent brand going as we have associated this brand for more than 3 decades in Singapore. It has a fantastic brand with lots of good will. I sincerely hope Conrad keeps up with its tradition and soul of Regent.

title: Regent @ Christmas
desc: Managed to have my Christmas Staycation @ Regent before it rename After all this while when I was a kid I was hoping to stay at Regent during Christmas. The overall experience I could say was a little disappointed. 1. bedside table plug is not working 2. No Small plates 3. Bed is very stiff 4. No leg rest But the worse thing was the breakfast as due to high occupancy the hotel schedule the breakfast for my first day to the ballroom and after a couple had finish their breakfast. It took about 15 - 20 mins for someone to automatic come and clean the tables and plates. There is even one chef who even went out to serve this particular guest by serving food to the guest. Which I think is not very fair for other guest. Even if the guest is a VVIP the hotel should not

title: Lacklustre Service
desc: Lacklustre Service. Average club lounge offerings. Checking out later today but felt compelled to write this review while I'm having high tea at the Club Lounge. Have always held high regard in the service here but was sorely disappointed. Not sure if it was due to the rebranding exercise taking place, staff generally had that "I don't care atttitude". During breakfast service this morning, it seems like the staff I have encountered did not know how to manage food allergies or simply can't be bothered. Informed the chef at noodle station about my son's allergies and wanted to confirm the ingredients but the chef serving the food seemed to be really irritated by the request from his replies. Hence, approached another staff to confirm what was safe for him to take but was given

title: Club room staycation
desc: Managed to stay here in Regent before it converts to Conrad Orchard. + Club room is spacious with decently sized twin beds and large smart TV + Lounge opens from 11am, offers basic high-tea (small sandwiches and cakes) and evening hors d'oeuvre and alcoholic drinks (good selection) + Breakfast at Basilico had a nice selection - Dated furnishing, the hotel really showed its age, although still well-maintained at some areas - Not many electronic plugs - Location is not near popular places, have to take private or public transport to orchard road. As this was a staycation, we mainly stayed within the hotel vicinity and enjoyed the club room benefits. We find it a better experience with club room.

title: Not Really 5-Star Experience … …
desc: Pretty average and somewhat disappointing experiences. Room and general public facilities looked old and tired. Bed comfort was very good though. Most staff members were good with some (the young Chinese guy at check in and two ladies at Tea Lounge) were excellent. Don’t mind the hotel room being old and bathroom was steamy, but I do mind about the food quality. Tried buffet high tea at Tea lounge, pretty mediocre compared to other 5 star hotels nearby. The worst and most disappointing perhaps is the buffet breakfast each day, although most staff were nice. The selection of foods and the foods quality, sadly speaking, was the worst that I had tried at a hotel of such caliber. On the superficial appearances, there seemed to have “lots” of foods, but when looking closely, most

title: Mixed Experience
desc: Mixed experience — Attending and assisting a nephew’s wedding today. Last night, while dropping off some logistics for the luncheon today, we were greeted and assisted by 2 very helpful concierge staff ( Chris & Kishore). Unfortunately, one unpleasant surprise is we were told that if we used confetti, we had to clean and vacuum them ourselves using our own vacuums!

Elaine and team provided great service! Cozy environment and good food! Wide tea selection. Ice chocolate drink was fantastic. Our team enjoyed the high tea event. Spotlight a little warm. Probably stronger air con.

title: A wonderful and memorable Staycation at Regent Hotel
desc: It is one of the best staycay that we had during our recent stay at Regent Hotel. The warmth and kindness hospitality makes our stay filled with memories that makes us wanna go back again when they reopen as Conrad Orchard in 2024. Special shoutout to the Club lounge team esp Fiqar "You guys are AWESOME!!"

title: Wedding
desc: Attended a friend's wedding at Regent Hotel. Service led by banquet manager, Murugam was great. Food was fresh and tasty. Portion was huge as well. Had a great time with everyone at the wedding lunch!

title: Great service but dated rooms
desc: We held our wedding here a couple of years back and thought we’d come back for a weekend staycation before the rebranding of the hotel in 2023. Booked a premium room with balcony for 10 Dec and were given a room on the 7th floor. Clean room but the interior and the balcony is quite dated. Each time you (or your neighbour) flushes the toilet, it sounds like a helicopter taking off. The soundproofing is awful; could be because we were given a room with a connecting door. Even more unfortunate for us was that a bunch of youngsters had checked in next door for a birthday celebration. We could hear their ruckus and conversation all night. Amost impossible for us to sleep. Ask for a room without a connecting door if you can. Hotel staff were lovely as usual. Would have given 5

title: Emcee for wedding at regent hotel
desc: Murugan was really helpful to ensure the smooth running of the wedding banquet. As an emcee, provided me with timely information to proceed with each of the wedding segments. He was also really helpful to resolve many other random request, which were really out of the way. But he did it. Please keep the great work up!

title: Royal Experience at Summer Palace
desc: Impeccable service. Actual high-grade tea. Polished food. Never disappoints. The wintermelon soup is an umami bomb. The lamb is all flavor and no gameyness. Go for the bird's nest in almond milk at the end of the meal. Keeps you warm all the way home.

title: Visiting the tea lounge at regent singapore
desc: Excellent service, location and high tea snacks. Drinks were great as well. Further point to comment is on Alice, who is extremely detailed and also took photos for us while rearranging our table nicely for the photo!!

title: Relaxing birthday tea session
desc: We had a good experience having afternoon tea at the Regent Tea Lounge. It was our first time here celebrating my mom's birthday. The service was very attentive and they even prepared a little cake surprise. Special mention to Alice and team for the thoughtfulness and her professional photog skills!

title: Hi-Tea
desc: The ambiance is so nice and welcoming . The staff was so accommodating and service is fast. The desserts were very nice and a lot of variety to choose. We had a great time enjoying thr ambience. Special mention to Ms. Koh for so accommodating.

title: Brunch at Tea Lounge
desc: Excellent brunch with family at the Tea Lounge. Food options, while limited, were high quality and delicious! Scones are some of the best in Singapore. Not dry and crusty. Also kudos to all the staff - service was attentive and kind. They even proactively offered ice cream to our niece and made her feel special. We really enjoyed ourselves!

title: Afternoon tea
desc: Went to tea lounge for afternoon tea. Even myself, I had really good time there. Thanks for caring about me Alice. Her tea selection was really nice. If you would like to solo afternoon tea, I recommend here.

title: Good place to stay and dine
desc: This is definitely one of the place where you will feel welcome by the great smiles and comfortable settings of the hotel. You have to go to dolcetto for the wide range of breads and MUST TRY Cakes. You will feel so welcomed by the dolcetto staff esp Yoon, Joan, Mel, Melody. They really will liven up your day with their big smiles while chatting with them and enjoying a quick cuppa. If you enjoy chinese food, Summer Palace is the place to go and for an authentic taste of italian food, Basilico located on the 2nd floor. I will definitely come back regularly.

title: Absolutely perfect!
desc: I have visited this Bar Restaurant many times, easy to reach in the heart of the city, an excellent idea for a business breakfast or with friends. The thing I appreciate the most is the relaxing environment and the kindness of the staff, together with the superlative food and coffee! I also enjoyed the light and super yummy lunch! Well done, keep it up!

title: Dolcetto at Conrad hotel is a classy and relaxing coffee shop experience
desc: Dolcetto is a must visit for anyone looking for a classy and relaxing tea experience. It’s the best place in town for the yummiest cakes and breads. The best part of Dolcetto is the smiling and welcoming staff ! A special mention to Yun, Mel and Melody - they all make every visit a memorable one.

title: Warm people, great hotel
desc: I have been a big fan of the venue, the staff for many many years and would probably be one for the foreseeable Future. The warmth with the smiles at the entrance to the hello mister J is something that can’t be bought. I’m here most weekends with my family and it’s a wonderful space to relax.

title: Managing Director, Executive Search
desc: We have been loyal patrons of Dolcetto, the Italian bakery at Conrad for over 10 years by now. Their desserts are consistently the best in their class, all intricately and delicately baked with the finest ingredients you can taste with each delicious bite. Their service team is also highly professional, going the extra mile to ensure our regular cake orders are well taken care of and even taking the trouble to update us when the bakery introduces new dessert collections. It's no wonder why we have bought our cakes from Dolcetto for over 10 years and will continue to do so for years to come!

title: Tea lounge Conrad Singapore Orchard
desc: Wonderful service by the staffs Apple in taking our orders and Chef Chong for his wonderful hospitality at Tea Lounge. Amazing food prepared by Chef Chong. He went out of his way to prepare a special due to dietary restrictions. Your go to place - Tea Lounge.

title: Wonderful food and service
desc: The best food and the loveliest and friendliest staff at the Conrad, I have been going there for years and now with my babies because of their warmth and generous hospitality especially received by Yoon and her team. Home away from home.

title: Tea Lounge 5 star experience :)
desc: Alice has great service and recommendation for the drinks and food collection. Love the ambience and the spread of food. 💕 each dish is delectable and nice range of savoury and sweet too! Thank you for the great experience

title: Wedding at Regent/Conrad Singapore Orchard (18 Mar 23)
desc: Hosted my wedding here at regent / Conrad Singapore Orchard. Staffs were all super friendly and helpful. Only a bit disappointed that we werent able to stay in the hotel during the wedding due to the renovation. But the hotel does make up with ample other benefits for us. The banquet manager and catering managers were all very helpful and friendly, including the rest of the hotel staffs (Willius , vicky, vanessa , Herman and all other hotel staffs) . Food was fantastic, only one word can summarise it , “perfect”. All my wedding guests all complimented on the quality and taste of the food as well as the portion is huge. Once again i would like to thank all the hotel staffs members who made my wedding successful.

title: Dolcetto best cafe in Tanglin area
desc: Gorgeous hotel with the best staff. Dolcetto cafe has the best bread and patisserie in Singapore. The coffee is Illy and is always good. The staff are so friendly and cannot do enough for you. A particular shout out to Yoon who is just so kind and always efficient. It is a really well managed hotel and this cafe is a favourite with locals.

title: Dinner wedding banquet
desc: Chosen Conrad to hold my wedding banquet and I would like to comment that the hotel coordinator Vanessa Goh had been very patient in helping with the planning throughout and ensured that all my requests were met. the Banquet Manager, Anba, was also very proactive and efficient and was very hands-on in assisting his staff for the day. Without him, my husband wouldn’t have had that of an easier time during the banquet. Highly recommend this hotel and team to work with for your wedding matters!

title: Conrad Orchard Singapore: Where Honesty is Not the Best Policy
desc: Greetings esteemed reviewers, it is with great dismay that I pen this review to share my recent experience at the Conrad Orchard Singapore which was well below expectation. This isn't my first time to stay here. In a previous review, I had bestowed upon the hotel a rating of four stars and had made mention of the General Manager's name, Oscar Postma, as a mild critique of their performance. My stay had been quite wonderful, albeit marred by their proclivity towards complacency in providing minor special requests. However, I found myself the subject of ill-treatment at the hands of the hotel's personnel. Their behavior was nothing short of bullying, as they proceeded to pursue punitive measures against my top-tier membership in their esteemed chain of hotels, ultimately

title: Tea Lounge afternoon tea
desc: I visited the tea lounge for afternoon tea. Food selection was great and most importantly tasty. I love the seafood porridge and laksa. Menu had good coffee and tea selection. Service was prompt.Overall we had a good time!

title: Cheese buffet!
desc: The cheese buffet in the Conrad Hotel Singapore Orchard was so delicious. At around $68 per person (SGD) it's great if you can stuff yourself full of delicious Italian cheeses and honey. Truffle honey and truffle mozzarella = some of my favorites. Nice staff, nice vibe, and definitely nice cheese, yum!

title: Afternoon tea
desc: The high tea set was excellent! Every dish in the buffet was well done and we had free flow of beverage. Our server Charlene C was very friendly and professional with her service. We will definitely come again.

title: Wonderful Birthday Celebration ,amidst the best hospitality possible !
desc: Wonderful experience ,as always - perhaps even better than the previous perfect visits! This ,is made better than perfect because of Ramesh and Chef Chong. My mother-in -law is so pleased and we are so thankful for the thoughtfulness and loving kindness that Ramesh and his team has shown to us. We were given warm ,polite hospitality during the 2 hour meal here . We were last here 1,2 years ago and it’s so good to come back to Tea Lounge ,for the buffet high tea experience- good to see Ramesh again too. It’s great coming back to Tea Lounge ,to a familiar face . Well done ,again!!!!

title: Sunday high tea buffet
desc: Came to Tea Lounge for Sunday high tea. The amount of food options available that are both sweet and savory are great! Really nice selection of teas and the customer service was fantastic. Super attentive and friendly. Would definitely come back!

title: TOP VENUE FOR HIGH TEA
desc: No place better than Tea Lounge. Best place, best service and best food. Appreciate so much Chef Chong and the service team Mr Ramesh Pavadai, Ms Sashini, Ms Nisa and the rest of the team for making our afternoon so wonderful. We will definitely visit again and again. Thank you so much 🙏😊

title: Exceptional service and definitely would return
desc: Hotel is very high end and well maintained. Has many dining options, and if you go for an executive room its worth it as the lounge has a variety of food and drinks. Across the road for a massive mall suntec. The spa was amazing and if your a Hilton honors you may be entitled to a discount. Over all amazing stay.
